children.totalText: [警示尖鸣] does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into Starved Crawler, who then cast [饥肠辘辘] and fixate on the other players in your group.
Your goal is to keep the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [贪得无厌] per Crawler eaten.
The boss receiving any stack of [贪得无厌] likely results in a wipe.
[蛛纱强袭] spawns [邪恶缠网] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is  recommended to conserve space.
[贪食撕咬] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Using [吸血鬼之血] for every single one is recommended.
[穿刺] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[钻地冲击]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to go underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [穿刺] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
[感染] spawns a [无休虫群], just don't stand in it.
You can [反魔法护罩] before [感染] runs out so it does not spawn [无休虫群].
During [虫群之眼] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[穿刺] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [流丝束缚] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
Use [死亡之握] to get them under the boss to cleave them down easily.
[宇宙奇点] requires you to stand in [抓握之血] while the cast is finishing.
Outplay this mechanic with [死亡脚步] but make sure you do not stand under the boss. Otherwise, you get the [消隐] debuff.
[培植毒药] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires.
Use [吸血鬼之血] to tank this debuff.
You can also pre-use [反魔法护罩] to immune the application.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [共振弹幕]
Ixin - [惊惧尖鸣]
Bloodstained Webmage - [恶臭齐射]
Blood Overseer - [毒液箭雨]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [预警尖鸣]
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Helpful spells against this are [死亡之握] or [致盲冰雨].
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [野蛮猛击]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.

[震地猛击] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.Use ‍Vampiric Blood or any other defensive necessary whenever tanking the first one.Do not use ‍Anti-Magic Shell since it immunes ‍Seismic Reverberation.
[震地回响] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [石盾].
The goal is to tank the first [震地猛击] and get dispelled to receive [石盾] for the following one.
[不稳定尖刺] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[折光射线] targets random players which can then clear the [不稳定尖刺].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
With [反魔法护罩] you can immune the [不稳定尖刺] debuff stacks.
[结晶猛击] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [结晶喷发] debuff fall off between kills.
[无常碾压] summons [不稳定的能量] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[排放口]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [废料颂].
[熔铁之水]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
[废料颂]
Move the boss to the side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[炽焰波峰]
Similar to [废料颂], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[火成岩锤]
Deals high magic damage. Use [反魔法护罩] or [吸血鬼之血] here.
[虚空腐蚀]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [虚空裂隙].
Immune the application of it with [反魔法护罩] whenever possible.
[熵能清算]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [咆哮恐惧]
Void Bound Howler - [穿透哀嚎]
Forgebound Mender - [愈合金属]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Void Bound Despoiler - [虚空爆发]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [大地爆发] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[压迫之链] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[压制] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Utilize [反魔法护罩] as much as possible here.
[惊魂恫吓] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[疑之影] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
If you would get hit, use [冰封之韧] to break the stun.
[喧神教化] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [残存影响] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.

The first tank mechanic, [邃影斩] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [暮落] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[协同步法] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.
After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [霜凝匕首] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [冰冻之血] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Utilize [反魔法护罩] to deal with this mechanic.
[黏稠黑暗] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[腐化附层] gets applied by soaking a orb.
[反魔法护罩] immunes the application of [腐化附层].
[溢流猛击] is the magic tank hit which slows you afterwards.
[血之激涌]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [血之激涌] creates a pool under the boss.
[变易异常] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[捻接]
Can be immuned with [反魔法护罩].
[震颤猛击]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[晦幽纺纱]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [变易异常], keep the boss close to your group.
[汰劣程序]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Use [吸血鬼族裔] on every single one.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [流丝缠缚]
Herald of Ansurek - [扭曲思绪]
Covert Webmancer - [愈合之网]
Sureki Unnaturaler - [虚空之波]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [虚空奔袭]
Royal Venomshell - [毒性喷吐]
[上钩了]
The boss is fixating on players and is not tankable. You are responsible for the adds.
Every 25% boss HP he calls in 1 Irontide Cleaver and 1 Irontide Powdershot
Irontide Cleaver
[沉重挥砍]
Aim this frontal away from any team member and any [重型军火].
Irontide PowdershotDrag the Irontide Cleaver close and focus them down or ‍Death Grip them in.
Is standing still most of the time casting [炽热弹头]
[大规模轰炸]
Applies [瞄准火炮], move with your melee team.
[炽烈弹射]
Avoid stacking up on this mechanic.
[清扫甲板]
This is a very fast frontal so aim it away from any players.
[紧急回避] - Be ready to pick up the following adds:
Ashvane Deckhand
[腥红横扫]
Another fast frontal to aim away.
Ashvane Cannoneer
[舷侧攻击]
Long cast frontal that should be aimed away from the group.
[易爆军火]
Pick this up and use the ExtraActionButton to shoot the boss down.
[毁灭之潮]
A frontal that needs to be aimed away from the group whenever possible.
[激流破奔]
Bait the water pools away from the statue in the middle.
[海潮涌动]
Summons 2 waves that need to be dodged back to back. Be ready to move the boss to a safe spot and aim [毁灭之潮] away from the group when it is about to be cast as this can be a deadly overlap.
[腐败之水]
You can pre use [反魔法护罩] but it's never 100% since only 2 people get affected by this debuff.
If you are standing in a different position than anyone else you can see the animation come from the boss towards you and use [反魔法护罩] well before it hits you.
Demolishing Terror‍SlamIf you have ‍Putrid Waters and a ‍Slam is about to happen make sure to rotate defensives.
[甲板破碎者]
Don't leave melee of the Demolishing Terror.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ashvane Commander - [强化怒吼]
Irontide Waveshaper - [防水甲壳]
Bilge Rat Tempest - [窒息之水]
Bilge Rat Pillager - [恶臭喷吐]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Scrimshaw Enforcer - [抽脸者]
Casted frontal cone that is hard to see.
Irontide Raider - [铁钩] into [狂野风暴]
Blacktar Bomber - [火焰炸弹]
Ashvane Commander - [艾泽里特炸药]
Irontide Curseblade - [诅咒挥砍]
Irontide Powdershot - [炽热弹头]
Ashvane Spotter - [瞄准火炮]
Bilge Rat Demolisher - [碾压重击]
Ashvane Invader - [钉刺之毒]
Always stack in a line to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Use [反魔法护罩] to pre-immune the stacks before they are cleared with [折光射线].
Use [冰封之韧], [巫妖之躯], or [反魔法领域] for [大地破裂].
Use [反魔法护罩], [冰封之韧], [巫妖之躯], or [反魔法领域] before [无常碾压] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
You can [灵界打击] between ticks of [不稳定的能量] as well.
Put Speaker Brokk in focus, so you can use [心灵冰冻] easily.
During [排放口], 3 out of the 4 vents in the intercardinal directions are active. Look around and locate the safe vent, go there quickly to not get cut off by puddles on the ground.
The [熔岩波] from the cube will always traverse in the cardinal directions so as long as you are on a vent you are in a safespot.
Use your defensives during [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Killing both bosses at the same time is a must to avoid [沉默代言人].
[虚空腐蚀] applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with ‍[虚空裂隙].
Immune the application of it with ‍[反魔法护罩] whenever possible.
Use defensives on [熵能清算] to allow you to drop it on top of another zone.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[噤声齿轮] from Turned Speaker.
[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[弧形虚空] from Cursedheart Invader.
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs which afflict him with [重型军火].
Irontide Powdershots are standing still in range and the majority of the time are casting ‍[炽热弹头], use [死亡之握] or [憎恶附肢] to bring them in.
Use [反魔法护罩] if you are targeted by [炽热弹头].
Always watch where the tank is facing the Irontide Cleavers to dodge the ‍[沉重挥砍] especially when kiting the boss.
You can pre [反魔法护罩] [大规模轰炸] to not drop any [瞄准火炮].
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the phase change to quickly use [易爆军火] to get the boss down from the ship.
Always be standing behind Dread Captain Lockwood as ‍[清扫甲板] is a very fast frontal cone.
The Ashvane Canoneer casts [舷侧攻击] which is another frontal cone to dodge.
Always use a charge of [死亡脚步] when [海潮涌动] happens to dodge the waves and be in a decent position for [激流破奔].
Use [反魔法护罩] on every other [激流破奔] and rotate a defensive for the other one.
You can pre ‍[反魔法护罩] on [腐败之水] but it is never a 100% immune since only 2 people get affected by this debuff.

If you are standing in a different position than anyone else you can see the animation come from the boss towards you and use use ‍[反魔法护罩] well before it hits you but it is quite fast and affects you from farther away than you expect.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[盐渍飞弹] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[防水甲壳] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[水箭] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[强化怒吼] from Ashvane Commander.
[死亡脚步] is useful for helping you dodge [暗影烈焰吐息].
Rotate [冰封之韧] and [巫妖之躯] on [命令咆哮].
Use [反魔法护罩] during [炽热].
Bait [烈火斩] close towards the edge to save as much space as possible.
Use [死亡脚步] and [反魔法护罩] for [暮光打击] to immune the knockback and prevent damage.
Help slow the Shadowflame Spirits with [寒冰锁链], especially once they are under the boss.
You can [死亡之握] the Shadowflame Spirits if they are not on you to help with kiting, this does not cause them to refixate.
[[反魔法护罩]] allows you to clear multiple Void Tendrils. Careful as this does damage still so you need to watch the amount of 反魔法护罩 absorb you have remaining!
[冰封之韧] also allows you to clear Void Tendrils but is not up for every wave.
Rotate [巫妖之躯] and ‍Anti-Magic Zone for ‍Abyssal Corruption.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[晦暗之风] from Twilight Destroyer
You can LoS this cast.
If you are not hiding from it, make sure you use [死亡冲锋] or you are not facing towards the edge to not fall down.
Use [冰封之韧] or [巫妖之躯] on [警示尖鸣].
You can also [灵界打击] between hits if necessary.
[警示尖鸣] is physical damage don't waste your [反魔法护罩] on it.
Use [反魔法护罩] on [蛛纱强袭].
If [致盲冰雨] is available, you can use it on the Starved Crawlers and they will refixate so you can do damage to them. This can also cause the fixates to be worse than before so be careful!
Avoid kiting Starved Crawlers into the boss else the boss receives [贪得无厌].
AoE them down if you are not fixated by them.
You can use [反魔法护罩] before every other cast of [感染] expires so it does not spawn a [无休虫群].
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn and cast ‍[流丝束缚] at someone random during the fight.
Use ‍[死亡之握] to get them under the boss to cleave them down easily.
Use a [反魔法护罩], [冰封之韧], or [巫妖之躯] while affected by [培植毒药] since it hits like a truck.
You can also [灵界打击] between ticks if necessary.
[死亡脚步] allows you to not go in to the blood that roots you and not get gripped, just be out of melee when the cast completes.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[共振弹幕] from Trilling Attendant.
[惊惧尖鸣] from Ixin.
[恶臭齐射] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[毒液箭雨] from Blood Overseer.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[预警尖鸣] from Sentry Stagshell.
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
[野蛮猛击] from Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard.
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Use your defensives during [喧神教化].
Make sure to be on top of the tank when the boss casts ‍[喧神教化] to not get cut off from the group.
If you pre [反魔法护罩] [疑之影], it removes a set of balls to dodge.
Angle your camera so you can see the people with ‍[疑之影] to be able to dodge their orbs easily when removed.
If you are playing [无效魔法], your [疑之影] expires before the rest of your group's debuffs.
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use [冰封之韧] or [巫妖之躯] if you're targeted by this ability.
You can pre-immune [寒冰镰刀] with [反魔法护罩].
Your tank will get afflicted by [冰冻之血], be close to the tank so he can drop his stacks quickly.
[反魔法护罩] allows you to soak multiple orbs that spawn from [黏稠黑暗].
If you have taken any damage recently, use [灵界打击] to heal off the absorb on yourself if you have nothing better to do.
Use [反魔法护罩] for every other cast of [捻接] and rotate between [冰封之韧], [巫妖之躯], and using [灵界打击] to heal yourself for this since it's the highest damage event during this fight.
Use [反魔法领域] on the overlap between [捻接] and [震颤猛击].
[震颤猛击] looks like a physical effect but is actually nature damage.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[蛛网箭] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[阴织冲击] from Covert Webmancer.
[愈合之网] from Covert Webmancer.
[扭曲思绪] from Herald of Anurek.
[虚空之波] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Always stack in a line to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Use [反魔法护罩] to pre-immune the stacks before they are cleared with [折光射线].
Use [冰封之韧], [巫妖之躯], or [反魔法领域] for [大地破裂].
Use [反魔法护罩], [冰封之韧], [巫妖之躯], or [反魔法领域] before [无常碾压] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
You can [灵界打击] between ticks of [不稳定的能量] as well.
Put Speaker Brokk in focus, so you can use [心灵冰冻] easily.
During [排放口], 3 out of the 4 vents in the intercardinal directions are active. Look around and locate the safe vent, go there quickly to not get cut off by puddles on the ground.
The [熔岩波] from the cube will always traverse in the cardinal directions so as long as you are on a vent you are in a safespot.
Use your defensives during [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Killing both bosses at the same time is a must to avoid [沉默代言人].
[虚空腐蚀] applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with ‍[虚空裂隙].
Immune the application of it with ‍[反魔法护罩] whenever possible.
Use defensives on [熵能清算] to allow you to drop it on top of another zone.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[噤声齿轮] from Turned Speaker.
[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[弧形虚空] from Cursedheart Invader.
Consider using a defensive if you're affected by [塌缩之夜].
As a melee, unless you are playing with less than 2 ranged or people are dead, you should not get this.
Interrupt[暗影箭] whenever cast.
Use [反魔法护罩], [冰封之韧], [巫妖之躯], or [反魔法领域] for the [暗黑法球] and [晦影腐朽].
[侵蚀喷涌] applies [萦绕侵蚀] which can be immuned with [反魔法护罩].
If [阿拉希炸弹] is about to explode, its damage can be immuned with [反魔法护罩].
Use [死亡脚步] to quickly break [喷射丝线].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[暗夜箭] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[诱捕暗影] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[深重呕吐]
Spawns Carrion Worm, utilize your slows while killing these.
[恶臭气体]
Position the boss close to other pools to maximize room usage as Fetid Gas creates a pool under the boss.
[嚼碎]
Physical tank hit.
[亡者领域]
Move the boss close to the Reanimated Crosbowman while interrupting the Reanimated Mage.
Use [死亡之握] to get any far away adds closer to each other.
[邪恶狂乱]
If your group can't purge this Enrage effect, watch your health since the boss starts doing a lot more damage.
[通灵箭]
Interrupt this as much as possible.
[唤醒造物]
Always make sure to pick up Stitchflesh's Creation. They spawn in one of the back corners of the room looking at the boss.
Position the Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle of the room to make aiming [肉钩] easy.
[劈肉]
Physical tank hit.
[逃脱]
After this is cast position Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle.
[彗星风暴]
Stack up with your melees to dodge this mechanic together.
[寒冰碎片]
This tank hit is being cast at you all the time and does high physical damage to you.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [排干体液]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [严酷命运]
Zolramus Sorcerer - [暗影之井]
Move when this ability is being casted to avoid getting hit.
Skeletal Marauder - [恐怖顺劈]
Fast frontal cast.
Zolramus Bonecarver - [白骨剥离]
Reduces your max hp per stack, start kiting if necessary.
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted unless it is a warrior that has [法术反射] ready.
Use [反魔法护罩] or [巫妖之躯] on [憎恨之容] to immune the fear.
Try to line up your big cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
[寒冰锁链] the Illusionary Vulpins to prevent them from reaching their target.
If you or your group has nothing for Illusionary Vulpins, you can [死亡之握] and [反魔法护罩] it. Careful as it still does the aoe stun and will hit other people, but you will not get stunned!
Use defensives during the [猜谜游戏] as it is the only time damage is dealt during this fight.
The [心灵连接] is always cast on the tank, make sure you are on the opposite side of the boss and run away with [死亡脚步] to break it as fast as possible.
Immune the pull in of [凝结毒素] with [死亡脚步].
Kill the Gormling Larva if you are not the [被标记的猎物] target.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.
[滋养森林] from Mistveil Tender.
[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.
[再生鼓舞] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[模拟抗性] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs which afflict him with [重型军火].
Irontide Powdershots are standing still in range and the majority of the time are casting ‍[炽热弹头], use [死亡之握] or [憎恶附肢] to bring them in.
Use [反魔法护罩] if you are targeted by [炽热弹头].
Always watch where the tank is facing the Irontide Cleavers to dodge the ‍[沉重挥砍] especially when kiting the boss.
You can pre [反魔法护罩] [大规模轰炸] to not drop any [瞄准火炮].
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the phase change to quickly use [易爆军火] to get the boss down from the ship.
Always be standing behind Dread Captain Lockwood as ‍[清扫甲板] is a very fast frontal cone.
The Ashvane Canoneer casts [舷侧攻击] which is another frontal cone to dodge.
Always use a charge of [死亡脚步] when [海潮涌动] happens to dodge the waves and be in a decent position for [激流破奔].
Use [反魔法护罩] on every other [激流破奔] and rotate a defensive for the other one.
You can pre ‍[反魔法护罩] on [腐败之水] but it is never a 100% immune since only 2 people get affected by this debuff.

If you are standing in a different position than anyone else you can see the animation come from the boss towards you and use use ‍[反魔法护罩] well before it hits you but it is quite fast and affects you from farther away than you expect.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[盐渍飞弹] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[防水甲壳] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[水箭] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[强化怒吼] from Ashvane Commander.
[死亡脚步] is useful for helping you dodge [暗影烈焰吐息].
Rotate [冰封之韧] and [巫妖之躯] on [命令咆哮].
Use [反魔法护罩] during [炽热].
Bait [烈火斩] close towards the edge to save as much space as possible.
Use [死亡脚步] and [反魔法护罩] for [暮光打击] to immune the knockback and prevent damage.
Help slow the Shadowflame Spirits with [寒冰锁链], especially once they are under the boss.
You can [死亡之握] the Shadowflame Spirits if they are not on you to help with kiting, this does not cause them to refixate.
[[反魔法护罩]] allows you to clear multiple Void Tendrils. Careful as this does damage still so you need to watch the amount of 反魔法护罩 absorb you have remaining!
[冰封之韧] also allows you to clear Void Tendrils but is not up for every wave.
Rotate [巫妖之躯] and ‍Anti-Magic Zone for ‍Abyssal Corruption.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[晦暗之风] from Twilight Destroyer
You can LoS this cast.
If you are not hiding from it, make sure you use [死亡冲锋] or you are not facing towards the edge to not fall down.
[灵魂之箭]
Interrupt this cast whenever possible.
[憎恨之容]
This fear can be immuned by [巫妖之躯] and [反魔法护罩].
[黑暗之拥]
Forces you to hit Droman Oulfarran.
[迷乱花粉]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.
[宗主之怒]
Save damage abilities for this phase.
[拍手手]
This cast is solely for you and needs to be interrupted by you.
[鬼抓人]
Summons Illusionary Vulpin fixating [鬼抓人锁定] on a player.
Use [寒冰锁链] on it to slow it.
[吞噬]
Interrupt this after breaking the shield on the boss.
[加速孵化]
Summons Gormling Larva, make sure to pick them up and bring them under the boss for cleave damage.
[被标记的猎物] makes them fixate on a player so support them with your slows.
[心灵连接]
Utilize [反魔法护罩] to immune the link on you.
[凝结毒素]
This creates a big circle around the boss while sucking you in. Run against it to not die.
Use [死亡脚步] to immune the suck in.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Drust Harvester - [收割精魂]
Mistveil Tender - [滋养森林]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [模拟抗性]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Drust Spiteclaw - [濒死之息]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Tirnenn Villager - [过度生长]
Drust Boughbreaker - [愤怒鞭笞]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Guardian - [心能挥砍]
Big tank buster, use [反魔法盾] to immune the dot application, otherwise rotate defensives.
Mistveil Defender - [迷雾结界]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Mistveil Stalker - [纱雾噬咬]
Mistveil Stinger - [心能注入]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [酸性新星]
Watch out for [疑之影], try to aim it away from the middle of the boss and not aim it at players, if you dont have it yourself, avoid getting hit at any cost.
Use your defensives during [喧神教化].
Pay attention to the void that is left after [喧神教化] as it ticks instantly and does massive damage, always look beforehand where the tank is and follow him closely.
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
Use your defensives for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
Watch out for the [黏稠黑暗] balls, Havoc Demon Hunter has a lot of self healing and sustain, help your team out by soaking them if possible.
Pay extra attention to the [变易异常] on this fight since they can be very hard to spot when they move and will likely kill you if you get hit.
Use your defensives for [捻接] since it's the highest damage event during this fight.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[蛛网箭] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[阴织冲击] from Covert Webmancer.
[愈合之网] from Covert Webmancer.
[扭曲思绪] from Herald of Anurek.
[虚空之波] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Always use [恶魔变形] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts.
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted unless it is a warrior that has [法术反射] ready.
Use [反魔法护罩] or [巫妖之躯] on [憎恨之容] to immune the fear.
Try to line up your big cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
[寒冰锁链] the Illusionary Vulpins to prevent them from reaching their target.
If you or your group has nothing for Illusionary Vulpins, you can [死亡之握] and [反魔法护罩] it. Careful as it still does the aoe stun and will hit other people, but you will not get stunned!
Use defensives during the [猜谜游戏] as it is the only time damage is dealt during this fight.
The [心灵连接] is always cast on the tank, make sure you are on the opposite side of the boss and run away with [死亡脚步] to break it as fast as possible.
Immune the pull in of [凝结毒素] with [死亡脚步].
Kill the Gormling Larva if you are not the [被标记的猎物] target.

Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.
[滋养森林] from Mistveil Tender.
[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.
[再生鼓舞] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[模拟抗性] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
Use [反魔法护罩] on [深重呕吐] or other defensives if you are targeted back to back.
Cleave down the Carrion Worms if you are not being targeted.
Use both charges of [死亡之握] and [憎恶附肢] to bring in the Reanimated Crosbowman or Reanimated Mages.
Interrupt [通灵箭] as much as possible.
Make sure you always have a charge of [死亡脚步] to easily get to the center of the room for the [肉钩].

To know when to [反魔法护罩], the boss targets you as he is casting. It is a 1 second cast so you need to be quick but this is an extremely high damage gain if you are able to be grabbed out of the animation.
You can stop the [排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collectors with ‍[死亡之握] and other cc's.
Be wary of the Skeletal Marauder's ‍[恐怖顺劈] as it is a fast frontal.
It is very important to aim the ‍[切肉飞刀] from the Flesh Crafter's on the high health targets in the pack to kill them faster.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.
[通灵箭] from Zolramus Sorceror & Zolarmus Necromancer.
[刺耳尖啸] from Skeletal Marauder.
[寒冰箭雨] from Reanimted Mage.
[瘀液喷撒] from Corpse Collector.
[修复血肉] from Flesh Crafter.
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted. Use either a mouseover or a focus kick macro here, as he is not your main target most of the time when he is casting.
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Use [悲苦咒符] or [召唤恐惧卫士] on the Illusionary Vulpins to prevent them from reaching their target.
Do not touch the Illusionary Vulpins at any point.
Use your defensives during the [猜谜游戏] and drop a [召唤深渊魔] if you see that your healer is struggling.
Be ready to [邪能冲撞] to help you and your group break [心灵连接] quickly, position accordingly beforehand.
Use [混乱新星] to help controll the adds and spawn souls for yourself.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.
[滋养森林] from Mistveil Tender.
[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.
[再生鼓舞] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[模拟抗性] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
Always use [恶魔变形] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts.
Use [疾影] or [虚空行走] in a very high key if you're targeted by [深重呕吐].
Always use [悲苦咒符] or [混乱新星] on Carrion Worms.
Use [悲苦咒符] on either the Reanimated Crossbowman or Reanimated Mage if you're not planning on killing them quickly.
Make sure to look out for [寒冰箭雨] casts from the Reanimated Mages as it does heavy group damage if let through.
If any adds are still alive during [最终收割], use [悲苦咒符] or [混乱新星] to crowd-control them. With them crowd-controlled, the boss doesn't cast [折磨回响] even though an add is alive.
Make sure that you are always ready for the [肉钩] to not have any accidents where you miss the boss with the hook.
Be ready to move away from the boss if you see that you are targetted by [冻结之缚] to not grief your group.
Use [疾影] if you get sent down by [黑暗放逐], you should not have a too hard time killing the add as Havoc Demon Hunter to get back up.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.
[通灵箭] from Zolramus Sorceror & Zolarmus Necromancer.
[刺耳尖啸] from Skeletal Marauder.
[寒冰箭雨] from Reanimted Mage.
[瘀液喷撒] from Corpse Collector.
[修复血肉] from Flesh Crafter.
Always use [恶魔变形] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts.
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs which afflict him with [重型军火].
Watch out for the [沉重挥砍] cast by the Irontide Cleaver as it will most likely one shot you.
This boss phases at 66% and 33%, make sure not to blow your cooldowns right before he phases, as he becomes immune.
Avoid getting hit by [清扫甲板] as it is a frontal ability done by the boss.
Use [疾影] for [炽烈弹射] as it deals tons of damage.
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the phase change to quickly use [易爆军火] to get the boss down from the ship.
If you can't find a safe spot for [海潮涌动] you can also use [虚空行走] to immune it.
Watch out if you are standing to close to the edge of the room as [海潮涌动] might spawn on you and instantly kill you.
Make sure to use [疾影] for the [猛击], especially important if it overlaps with [腐败之水].
Always focus the Demolishing Terror as he casts the [猛击].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[盐渍飞弹] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[防水甲壳] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[水箭] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[强化怒吼] from Ashvane Commander.
Always use [恶魔变形] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts.

Make sure to face your character towards where you want to go if you get targeted by [突岩尖刺] as it knocks you in that direction. Try to also position yourself properly as it spawns [滚石] that covers the floor and makes the fight hard to play if not placed correctly.
Use [疾影] before [命令咆哮].
If you mess up at any point or there is no space left for you to drop [滚石] use your [虚空行走] to stand in the void.
This boss has a lot of AoE damage and is both a defensive check and healer check. [锻造武器] and [熔浆火花] overlaps are very dangerous and needs a defensive.
Make sure to place the pool from [熔浆火花] in a good position, ideally next to old fire puddles where you are not going to move.
Use [疾影] during [暮光打击].

Do not attack the Invoked Shadowflame Spirits before you are not certain that you are not their fixated target, if the fixated target struggles to get away from it use [悲苦咒符] or [混乱新星] to help them create range.
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
Be careful with your movement abilities and do not touch Void Tendril as you are most likely dead if you do so.
Do not kill the Mutated Hatchlings before the [深渊腐蚀] happens as they give you a massive damage taken increase [暗影之伤].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
Always use [恶魔变形] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts.
[警示尖鸣] does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into Starved Crawler, who then cast [饥肠辘辘] and fixate on the other players in your group.
Your goal is to keep the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [贪得无厌] per Crawler eaten.
The boss receiving any stack of [贪得无厌] likely results in a wipe.
[蛛纱强袭] spawns [邪恶缠网] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is recommended to conserve space.
[贪食撕咬] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Rotate [烈火烙印] and [邪能毁灭] in order to mitigate effectively.
Keep as much [脆弱] as possible for DR from [虚空掠夺者].
[穿刺] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[钻地冲击]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to go underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [穿刺] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
[感染] spawns a [无休虫群], just don't stand in it.
During [虫群之眼] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[穿刺] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [流丝束缚] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
[宇宙奇点] requires you to stand in [抓握之血] while the cast is finishing.
Outplay this mechanic with [地狱火撞击] but make sure you do not stand under the boss. Otherwise, you get the [消隐] debuff.
[培植毒药] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires.
Use [烈火烙印] or [恶魔变形] to tank this debuff.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [共振弹幕]
Ixin - [惊惧尖鸣]
Bloodstained Webmage - [恶臭齐射]
Blood Overseer - [毒液箭雨]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [预警尖鸣]
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [野蛮猛击]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
[压迫之链] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[压制] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Pre-use [烈火烙印] or [邪能毁灭] to mitigate the damage and then use [转化生命] to get rid of the Movement speed effect.
[惊魂恫吓] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[疑之影] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
[喧神教化] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [残存影响] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.

The first tank mechanic, [邃影斩] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [暮落] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[协同步法] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.
After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [霜凝匕首] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [冰冻之血] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Rotate [烈火烙印] or [邪能毁灭] to mitigate the damage.
[黏稠黑暗] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[腐化附层] get applied by soaking a orb.
[溢流猛击] is a magic tank hit which slows you afterwards.
Use [转化生命] to get rid of the slow.
[血之激涌]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [血之激涌] creates a pool under the boss.
[变易异常] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[捻接]
[震颤猛击]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[晦幽纺纱]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [变易异常], keep the boss close to your group.
[汰劣程序]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Use [邪能毁灭] on everyone while you are outside.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [流丝缠缚]
Herald of Ansurek - [扭曲思绪]
Covert Webmancer - [愈合之网]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [虚空奔袭]
Royal Venomshell - [毒性喷吐]
[震地猛击] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.Rotate ‍Fel Devastation and ‍Fiery Brand. Make sure to utilize ‍Darkness when possible for this boss as he does large group damage.
[震地回响] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [石盾].
The goal is to tank the first [震地猛击] and get dispelled to receive [石盾] for the following one.
[不稳定尖刺] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[折光射线] targets random players which can then clear the [不稳定尖刺].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
[结晶猛击] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Rotate [邪能毁灭] and [烈火烙印] to mitigate the damage.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [结晶喷发] debuff fall off between kills.
[无常碾压] summons [不稳定的能量] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[排放口]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [废料颂].
[熔铁之水]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
[废料颂]
Move the boss to the side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[炽焰波峰]
Similar to [废料颂], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[火成岩锤]
Deals high magic damage. Rotate [邪能毁灭] and [烈火烙印] to mitigate the damage.
[虚空腐蚀]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [虚空裂隙].
[熵能清算]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [咆哮恐惧]
Void Bound Howler - [穿透哀嚎]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Void Bound Despoiler - [虚空爆发]
Forge Loader - [熔岩迫击炮]
Rock Smasher - [巨岩碾压]
Cursedforge Honor Guard - [重盾奔袭]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [大地爆发] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[黑暗降临]
When flying out and coming back be ready to interrupt [暗影箭].
[黑曜光束]
This mechanic's initial hit always hits you as a tank.
It deals a lot of damage so make sure you rotate [邪能毁灭] and [烈火烙印].
[塌缩之夜]
Targets 2 ranged players if available and spawns void zones under them.
Tank the boss towards the edge of the platform and rotate whenever this happens to min-max the room.
[暗黑法球]
Tank the boss in an open space so the orb can be aimed as far away as possible.
[恐惧猛击]
Find a corner to stand against so the knock up is prevented as much as possible.
Use [地狱火撞击] instantly to cancel the knock up.
[活化暗影]
Spawns Animate Shadows that cast [凝结黑暗].
Be ready to pick up aggro and interrupt them with [沉默咒符].
Not really much with this boss as its mechanics mostly affect the other members of the group.
[酸蚀喷发]
Interrupt this after flying to the boss to start stage 2.
[粘稠迸发]
This prevents you from moving away from the boss. Make sure you always stick to the boss and never leave melee.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:

To know when to [反魔法护罩], the boss targets you as he is casting. It is a 1 second cast so you need to be quick but this is an extremely high damage gain if you are able to be grabbed out of the animation.
You can stop the [排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collectors with ‍[死亡之握] and other cc's.

It is very important to aim the ‍[切肉飞刀] from the Flesh Crafter's on the high health targets in the pack to kill them faster.

Irontide Cleaver
[沉重挥砍]

Is standing still most of the time casting [炽热弹头]

Avoid stacking up on this mechanic.

Ashvane Deckhand

A frontal that needs to be aimed away from the group whenever possible.

Bait the water pools away from the statue in the middle.

Summons 2 waves that need to be dodged back to back. Be ready to move the boss to a safe spot and aim [毁灭之潮] away from the group when it is about to be cast as this can be a deadly overlap.

[狂奔怒吼] to help you and your group dodge [暗影烈焰吐息] from [命令咆哮].
Use [树皮术] or [生存本能] for [命令咆哮].
Use defensives during [锻造武器].
Bait the [烈火斩] to an already existing [熔岩池].
Drop your [熔浆火花] debuff near an existing [熔岩池].
Use [树皮术] or [生存本能] for [暮光打击].
You can [清除腐蚀] the [熵能诅咒]
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
You can use Mutated Hatchlings as a funnel for more boss damage! Do not kill them too quick or else you will have [暗影之伤] stacks for the [虚空涌动].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
You can LoS [晦暗之风].
Always use [渗透暗影] on cooldown so that you build an army of swarm, they stay when you start the key.
Take [清除腐蚀].
[警示尖鸣] does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into Starved Crawler, who then cast [饥肠辘辘] and fixate on the other players in your group.
Your goal is to keep the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [贪得无厌] per Crawler eaten.
The boss receiving any stack of [贪得无厌] likely results in a wipe.
[乌索尔旋风] is strong for keeping the Crawlers away from the boss as well as slowed and stacked.
[蛛纱强袭] spawns [邪恶缠网] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is  recommended to conserve space.
[贪食撕咬] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Using [树皮术] for every single one is recommended.
[穿刺] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[钻地冲击]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to go underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [穿刺] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
During [虫群之眼] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[穿刺] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [流丝束缚] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
Use [台风] to interrupt and get them under the boss to cleave them down easily.
[宇宙奇点] requires you to stand in [抓握之血] while the cast is finishing.
After [宇宙奇点] finished use [夺魂咆哮] to break yourself free of [抓握之血].
[培植毒药] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires.
Use [清除腐蚀] to dispel this debuff either from you or a weaker group member.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [共振弹幕]
Ixin - [惊惧尖鸣]
Bloodstained Webmage - [恶臭齐射]
Blood Overseer - [毒液箭雨]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [预警尖鸣]
A long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [野蛮猛击]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
[压迫之链] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[压制] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Use [树皮术] whenever possible.
[惊魂恫吓] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[疑之影] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
[喧神教化] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [残存影响] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.

The first tank mechanic, [邃影斩] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [暮落] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[协同步法] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.
After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [霜凝匕首] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [冰冻之血] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Use [树皮术] to tank this mechanic.
[黏稠黑暗] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[腐化附层] gets applied by soaking an orb.
[溢流猛击] is a magic tank hit that slows you.
[血之激涌]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [血之激涌] creates a pool under the boss.
[变易异常] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[震颤猛击]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[晦幽纺纱]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [变易异常], keep the boss close to your group.
[汰劣程序]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Use [树皮术] on every single one.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [流丝缠缚]
Herald of Ansurek - [扭曲思绪]
Covert Webmancer - [愈合之网]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [虚空奔袭]
Royal Venomshell - [毒性喷吐]
[震地猛击] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.Make sure to have ‍Ironfur stacks up and ‍Barkskin running when tanking the first hit of every rotation.
[震地回响] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [石盾].
The goal is to tank the first [震地猛击] and get dispelled to receive [石盾] for the following one.
[不稳定尖刺] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[折光射线] targets random players which can then clear the [不稳定尖刺].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
[结晶猛击] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [结晶喷发] debuff fall off between kills.
[无常碾压] summons [不稳定的能量] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[排放口]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [废料颂].
[熔铁之水]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
[废料颂]
Move the boss to the side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[炽焰波峰]
Similar to [废料颂], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[火成岩锤]
Use [树皮术] on as many of these as possible.
[虚空腐蚀]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [虚空裂隙].
Use [狂奔怒吼] to help yourself and the group deliver this debuff.
[熵能清算]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.

Ghastly Voidsoul - [咆哮恐惧]
Void Bound Howler - [穿透哀嚎]
Pay extra attention to these casts:

Cursedforge Honor Guard - [重盾奔袭]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [大地爆发] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[黑暗降临]
When flying out and coming back be ready to interrupt [暗影箭].
[黑曜光束]
This mechanic's initial hit always hits you as a tank.
It deals a lot of damage so make sure you press a defensive here.
[塌缩之夜]
Targets 2 ranged players if available and spawns void zones under them.
Tank the boss towards the edge of the platform and rotate whenever this happens to min-max the room.
[暗黑法球]
Tank the boss in an open space so the orb can be aimed as far away as possible.
[恐惧猛击]
Find a corner to stand against so the knock-up is prevented as much as possible.
Use [迎头痛击] to charge back to the boss after the knock-up.
[活化暗影]
Spawns Animate Shadows that cast [凝结黑暗].
Use [夺魂咆哮] to interrupt the casts.
Be ready to pick up the aggro and interrupt them if needed.
[侵蚀喷涌]
Use [树皮术] to tank [萦绕侵蚀] after.
[酸蚀喷发]
Interrupt this after flying to the boss to start stage 2.
[粘稠迸发]
This prevents you from moving away from the boss. Make sure you always stick to the boss and never leave melee.
[喷射丝线]
[狂奔怒吼] can help slower teammates use it when they get this debuff.

Forces you to hit Droman Oulfarran.
[迷乱花粉]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.

Utilize [狂奔怒吼] to run away and break the link.
[凝结毒素]

Physical tank hit. Use [树皮术].

Use [安抚] on the boss whenever he is enraged.
[通灵箭]
Interrupt this as much as possible.
[唤醒造物]
Always make sure to pick up Stitchflesh's Creation. They spawn in one of the back corners of the room looking at the boss.
Position the Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle of the room to make aiming [肉钩] easy.
[劈肉]
Physical tank hit. Use [树皮术].
[逃脱]
After this is cast position Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle.

Stack up with your melees to dodge this mechanic together.
[寒冰碎片]

Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [排干体液]

Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [严酷命运]
Skeletal Marauder - [恐怖顺劈]
Fast frontal cast.
Flesh Crafter - [切肉飞刀]
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Loyal Creation - [脊锤重压]
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
The boss casts [黑暗降临] at 50% so make sure to not use any major cooldowns as the boss is about to phase since you have to fly away.
Consider using a defensive if you're affected by [塌缩之夜]. Getting out of this quickly is important since it deals a lot of damage every 0.5 seconds.
Don't use your mobility during the [黑曜光束], as you are most likely dead if you touch it.
Watch out for the [暗黑法球] as the Orb tends to be bigger than the actual animation.
Stun [活化暗影] with [混乱新星] to spawn souls to increase your dps.
Use defensives for the [暗黑法球] and [晦影腐朽].
Help your team by collecting [阿拉希炸弹] to throw it at the boss, as you have high mobility.
Be aware of [侵蚀喷涌]. It applies [萦绕侵蚀] which is dangerous when combined with other damage events.
If you are the target of [酸液翻腾] in Phase 2, try to clear the area from webs.
Avoid standing in anything here as it does massive damage and will most likely kill you.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[暗夜箭] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[诱捕暗影] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
Always use [恶魔变形] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts.
[碎颅打击]
Deals 2 instances of physical damage over 2 seconds, while also applying a bleed to you.
[命令咆哮]
Summons [暗影烈焰吐息] so make sure to position the boss in the safe lane.

[锻造武器] - Summons one of the following 3 weapons:‍Molten FlurryPhysical damage cast while applying ‍Molten Spark to party members.‍Fiery CleaveThis frontal can be baited by anyone in the group. Bait this into a wall if possible.
[熔岩重锤]
Kite the boss during this duration, don't tank him.
While walking he leaves behind [熔岩池] so kite him at the edge of the room.
[暗影烈焰祈祷]
Invoked Shadowflame Spirit casts [烈焰凝视].
Slow it with [乌索尔旋风] or knock it away from the fixated target with [台风].
[暗影烈焰箭]
This cast is always on you, interrupt when it is ready.
[暮光打击]‍Twilight Wind spawns after, drag away from them to make it easy for the group.Outplay the knockback by using ‍Skull Bash after the cast finishes.
Position the boss in a new corner whenever [暮光打击] is coming up.
[噬体烈焰]
This frontal breath is always aimed at you, position it away from the group into a wall if possible.
[暗影飓风]
Position the boss in the middle of this circle and adjust when it starts shrinking.
[虚空涌动]
Summons Void Tendril
Don't run into them since [深渊之攫] will stun you.
[虚空灌输]
Summons Twilight Hatchling
When killed they explode with [暗影之伤].
[碾碎]
Physical and magical damage hit. This knocks you back so watch out for Void Tendrils.
Outplay the knockback with [迎头痛击] after the cast finishes.

General Tips
Always dispel [裹体之网] targets instantly.
Use your [塞纳里奥结界] exclusively for [蛛纱强袭].
General Tips
As [警示尖鸣] does physical damage shifting into [熊形态] works like an actual defensive cooldown here. Therefore rotate between [树皮术] and [铁木树皮] to survive [蛛纱强袭].
Use [甘霖] as the first line of emergency defensives, whenever you drop to low HP.
General Tips
Always stay close to the boss as it otherwise becomes harder to dodge [穿刺] the further you are away.
General Tips
Rotate through your healing arsenal to heal through the damage done by [感染].
General Tips
Fill holes in your healing cooldowns by using defensives and communicate that to your group.
General Tips
Keep an eye on your  [化身：生命之树] duration when soaking [抓握之血], as when the effect runs out you be freed of that blood and potentially dragged into your death by [宇宙奇点].
Always dispel one [培植毒药] as this dot does heavy damage.
General Tips
Rotate through your defensive arsenal whenever you are affected by [培植毒药].

A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Nakt - [巢穴的召唤]
Massive amount of damage to all players.
General Tips
Your Group needs to ensure that they are spread for [疑之影], so you can instantly dispel one debuff.
General Tips
The boss casts [喧神教化] every 32 seconds making it very easy for you to always have either a [森林再生] proc or [万灵之召] ready.
General Tips
On higher keys, always use a defensive when you tank [疑之影] for its full duration.
General Tips
Stack in melee to instantly remove [冰冻之血].
General Tips
Always ensure to have a healing cd ready when [寒冰镰刀] happens.
General Tips
Whenever [飞刀投掷] overlaps with [寒冰镰刀] use a personal.
General Tips
[黏稠黑暗] knocks you. Make sure to not be knocked into an already existing pool!
General Tips
Use [万灵之召] every time [黑暗脉动] happens, otherwise use your [森林再生] procs as often as possible as you need high constant healing on this encounter.
General Tips
Ensure to have a personal defensive active when [黑暗脉动] happens. This happens every 70 seconds so you will always have [树皮术] ready.
General Tips
Stay stacked with your group to maximize [百花齐放], as this fight has a high HPS requirement.
Stay stacked with your group, do not bait [变易异常] ahead.
General Tips
Ensure to be in [熊形态] whenever [震颤猛击] or [晦幽纺纱] happens to survive the initial damage.

Dispel [[震地回响]] right after the boss beginns casting [震地猛击] so your tank gets the damage reduction from 震地回响.
General Tips
Whenever you clear [不稳定尖刺] with [折光射线] you need to have a Healing Cooldown.
General Tips
Whenever you clear [不稳定尖刺] with [折光射线] ensure to have a defensive cooldown active.

Whenever Void fragments spawn instantly soak one to gain [不稳定的能量]. Extend the buff right before [加固壳壁].
General Tips
Rotate through your healing cooldown arsenal when the boss channels [虚空释能].
General Tips
Use your personal defensives when [虚空释能] happens.
General Tips
Make sure to look around for safe vents to not get caught by surprise.

Whenever [排放口] occurs, you need to have either a [万灵之召] or a [森林再生] ready to be able to heal through the massive damage.
General Tips
Use [树皮术] when [排放口] overlaps with [].
General Tips
Use [狂奔怒吼] to get rid of [虚空腐蚀] as soon as possible.
General Tips
This fight has a high constant HPS requirement so make sure you spread out your Cds to have a constant stream of high HPS.
General Tips
Ensure to have a personal defensive active when you still have a [虚空腐蚀] when the boss casts [熵能清算].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [咆哮恐惧]

General Tips
Dispel [燃烧之影] as fast as possible.
General Tips
Whenever you dispel [燃烧之影] your party gets a a dot with a healing absorb. Use a healing cooldown whenever [暗影之幕] is active to heal the dot off as fast as possible.
General Tips
There are no planned uses, use stuff freely when things go wrong.
General Tips
Make sure if you are targeted by [暗黑法球] to not aim it into a wall, as if it does not travel for a long time you will wipe.
General Tips
[晦影腐朽] happens every 41 seconds, so you have to alternate your healing cooldowns with your defensives and communicate that with your group. If you don't have either up this ability will kill you.
General Tips
Rotate your personals to mitigate damage from [晦影腐朽].
General Tips
Tell your group to not pick up [阿拉希炸弹] during [侵蚀喷涌] cast to avoid unnecessary high damage overlap in Phase 1.
General Tips
You need to heal through [侵蚀喷涌] because people do need their defensive for when they are targeted with [喷射丝线].
General Tips
You cannot get targeted by [喷射丝线] as a healer so make sure to use your personals on [侵蚀喷涌] instead.

Ashvane Deckhand
[腥红横扫]
Another fast frontal to aim away.
Ashvane Cannoneer
[舷侧攻击]
Long cast frontal that should be aimed away from the group.
[易爆军火]
Pick this up and use the ExtraActionButton to shoot the boss down.
[毁灭之潮]
A frontal that needs to be aimed away from the group whenever possible.
[激流破奔]
Bait the water pools away from the statue in the middle.
[海潮涌动]
Summons 2 waves that need to be dodged back to back. Be ready to move the boss to a safe spot and aim [毁灭之潮] away from the group when it is about to be cast as this can be a deadly overlap.
[腐败之水]
Use [树皮术] when tanking this since the magical damage is high.
Demolishing Terror‍SlamThis knocks you back. Use ‍Skull Bash to charge back to the Demolishing Terror afterwards.
[甲板破碎者]
Don't leave melee of the Demolishing Terror.

[迷乱花粉]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.
[宗主之怒]
Save a [烈火烙印] charge and [收割者战刃] if possible for this phase to do big damage.
[拍手手]
