Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Defender - [迷雾结界]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Mistveil Stalker - [纱雾噬咬]
Mistveil Stinger - [心能注入]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [酸性新星]
This fight is very simple due to [闪光术]. Happily blink anywhere you want to dodge the bosses mechanics.
Make sure to drop [滚石] towards the edge of the boss encounter to make it easier on the group.
Use defensives before the [命令咆哮] cast.
Use defensives during [炽热].
When targeted with [熔浆火花], be sure to drop this pool on the outside perimeter of the boss encounter.
Use defensives during [暮光打击].
Do not let the adds reach you when targeted by the [烈焰凝视] mechanic.
The orc is not the main boss of the encounter. After he dies, he is going to do some RP and jump on the back of a dragon! The encounter ends when the dragon reaches 50%.
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
Be sure to spread in the tiny space provided when targeted by the [深渊腐蚀] mechanic.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
General Tips
It is very easy to die on this boss if interrupts are not properly managed, ensure that during [黑暗之拥] no kick goes through as they will execute their target.
General Tips
Save your healing CDs for when Ingra is protected by [黑暗之拥] as before there is no damage.
General Tips
No planned uses, use stuff freely when things go wrong.
General Tips
You should root the fox spawned by [鬼抓人] to help your party.
General Tips
Save your healing cooldowns for [猜谜游戏] as that is the only time your Group takes damage.
General Tips
Rotate through your defensive arsenal while [猜谜游戏] is active.
General Tips
Focus on not moving a lot whenever [酸蚀排放] happens to not kill a team mate later down the line.
General Tips
Save your healing cds for [吞噬] as this is the only time your party takes heavy damage.
General Tips
Use your defensives whenever you are focused as [被标记的猎物].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Drust Harvester - [收割精魂]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [模拟抗性]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Drust Spiteclaw - [濒死之息]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Tirnenn Villager - [过度生长]
Drust Boughbreaker - [愤怒鞭笞]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Defender - [迷雾结界]
Always stack up to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Use defensives for [大地破裂].
Use your defensive before [无常碾压] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
Generally crystal shards die to passive cleave but swap to them if they are not dying.
Mage
Mage
Use your defensives on [熵能清算].

Make sure to utilize ‍[闪光术] and place ‍[熵灭] away from the group. Following this logic, the farthest ‍Void Rift should be consumed by you first so the group members with less mobility can reach the closer ones.

‍Unbridled Void is a cone so it becomes wider the further away you are. Keep that in mind and try to position yourself closer to the boss when possible to make it easier to dodge for yourself or be ready to close the distance with your mobility.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[噤声齿轮] from Turned Speaker.
[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[弧形虚空] from Cursedheart Invader.
Use your defensives during [喧神教化].
Always keep an eye on your tanks positioning and follow him. Otherwise it is very easy to get gripped with [压迫之链] through the pool that is left from [喧神教化], which very dangerous.
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
Make sure to position yourself close to the boss to maximise cleave uptime since ‍[暗影瞬步] targets a random player.
Use your defensives for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
Save big defensives such as ‍[完全石化] and ‍[深寒凝冰] to stand in puddles in order to save encounter space when soaking orbs.

[变易异常] moves onto player's location. Thus it is recommended to move together as a group throughout the whole fight to dodge the mechanic easier as it's going to be much more predictable. As a bonus it is also going to be easier to deal with ‍[晦幽纺纱] this way.
Use your defensives for [捻接] since it's the highest damage event during this fight.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[蛛网箭] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[阴织冲击] from Covert Webmancer.
[愈合之网] from Covert Webmancer.
[扭曲思绪] from Herald of Anurek.
[虚空之波] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted.
Try to avoid ‍[森林之泪] pools behind or around you whenever ‍[憎恨之容] is about to happen as it may fear you right into them.
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Help CC the Illusionary Vulpins to prevent them from reaching their target.
If your group is not crowd-controlling the Illusionary Vulpins, be sure to kill it quickly.
Use your defensives during the [猜谜游戏].
When casting ‍[[酸蚀排放]] the boss tries to predict the movement of the players from the previous ‍酸蚀排放. Try not to move too much during it to make dodging later on easier.
Save ‍[魔血] and ‍[闪光术] to quickly break ‍[心灵连接].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.
[滋养森林] from Mistveil Tender.
[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.
[再生鼓舞] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[模拟抗性] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
Use defensives if you're targeted by [深重呕吐].
Make sure to always have distance between you and Carrion Worms as their bites are very deadly.

If any adds are still alive during [最终收割], you can try sniping them with a [[龙息术]] to crowd-control them. With them crowd-controlled, the boss doesn't cast [折磨回响] even though an add is alive. Be careful though as 龙息术 breaks from any damage so you need to be really precise with it.
Be ready to interrupt casters that spawn from [亡者领域] so it is easier to gather them.
Always be ready to [闪光术] towards Surgeon Stitchflesh's grandstand to line up [肉钩] whenever you are targeted.
Be ready to [闪光术] into a corner when targeted by [冻结之缚] in a bad spot.
Whenever you get targeted by [黑暗放逐], always make sure to use [冲锋] when you fight the add downstairs. That is going to allow you to deal with it easily without taking any damage from add.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.
[通灵箭] from Zolramus Sorceror & Zolarmus Necromancer.
[刺耳尖啸] from Skeletal Marauder.
[寒冰箭雨] from Reanimted Mage.
[瘀液喷撒] from Corpse Collector.
[修复血肉] from Flesh Crafter.
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs, which afflict him with [重型军火].
Watchout for Bombs and plan your movement accordingly.
Always keep in mind that boss phases at 66% and 33% and there is a short delay before the intermission starts. So make sure to not use big cds right before the intermission.
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the intermission to quickly use [易爆军火] to get the boss down from the ship.
Be careful where you position yourself during ‍[激流破奔] as they leave water pools which may make hiding from ‍Tidal Surge harder than it should be.
If you can't find a safe spot for [海潮涌动], you can try using [闪光术] or [魔血] to teleport over the waves. It is very risky and should only be used as a last resort.
Be ready to utilize [魔血] whenever [猛击] knockback from the Demolishing Terror is coming.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[盐渍飞弹] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[防水甲壳] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[水箭] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[强化怒吼] from Ashvane Commander.
Make sure to keep track of [闪光术] and [魔血] to always have an easy time dealing with [暗影烈焰吐息] and not dying to it by accident.
Try to place ‍[滚石] on the edges of the room.
Use defensives for [命令咆哮].
Use defensives during [炽热].
Use defensive during [暮光打击].
Watchout for your teammates and help them with slowing the add if anyone is struggling with it.
Keep in mind that Drahga Shadowburner at the start is not the main boss and doesn't have that much HP so don't overcommit to it. Valiona that appears later on also dies at 50% so plan accordingly.
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
Be careful with AoE as killing Twilight Hatchling applies a ‍[暗影之伤] on your group which may lead to bad overlaps with ‍[暗影飓风].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
[警示尖鸣] does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into Starved Crawler, who then cast [饥肠辘辘] and fixate on the other players in your group.
Your goal is to keep the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [贪得无厌] per Crawler eaten.The boss receiving any stack of 贪得无厌 likely results in a wipe.
Use [平心之环] to keep the Crawlers away from the boss.
[蛛纱强袭] spawns [邪恶缠网] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is  recommended to conserve space.
[贪食撕咬] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Use [天神酒] for every single one.
Rotate betwen [躯不坏] and [壮胆酒] if needed.
[穿刺] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[钻地冲击]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to go underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [穿刺] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
[感染] spawns a [无休虫群], just don't stand in it.
During [虫群之眼] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[穿刺] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [流丝束缚] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
Use [平心之环] to interrupt and get them under the boss to cleave them down.
[宇宙奇点] requires you to stand in [抓握之血] while the cast is finishing.
[魂体双分] can be used to outplay this mechanic.
[宇宙奇点] grips you into the boss at 1 second left of the cast, so wait for the grip in and cast [魂体双分：转移] right after to be safe.
[培植毒药] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires or gets dispelled.
Use [清创生血] to dispel this debuff from one of your party members to help your healer.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [共振弹幕]
Ixin - [惊惧尖鸣]
Bloodstained Webmage - [恶臭齐射]
Blood Overseer - [毒液箭雨]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [预警尖鸣]
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Helpful spells against this are [扫堂腿], [平心之环] and [分筋错骨].
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [野蛮猛击]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Engorged Crawler - [毒性喷吐]
Make sure to dispell the debuff with [清创生血] on your party members.
Reinforced Drone - [勒握斩击]
A stacking debuff that slows you per stack, you can use [迅如猛虎] to remove all stacks.
[压迫之链] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[压制] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Utilize [迅如猛虎] to dispel the slow on yourself.
[惊魂恫吓] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[疑之影] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
[喧神教化] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [残存影响] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.
Use the ingame ping system to indicate where you want to move the boss after the AoE has happened so your team is aware of the upcoming boss movement.
The fight starts with Vx being stationary, this alternates after every intermission so try to keep the moveable boss always on top of the stationary boss.

The first tank mechanic, [邃影斩] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [暮落] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[协同步法] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.
After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [霜凝匕首] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [冰冻之血] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Use [天神酒] on this hit.
[黏稠黑暗] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[腐化附层] get applied by soaking a orb.
[溢流猛击] is a magic tank hit that slows you.
[血之激涌]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [血之激涌] creates a pool under the boss.
[变易异常] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[震颤猛击]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[晦幽纺纱]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [变易异常], keep the boss close to your group.
You can use [迅如猛虎] to help free someone when they're dangerously low on HP.
[汰劣程序]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Use [天神酒] on every single one.
Rotate through [散魔功] and [躯不坏].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [流丝缠缚]
Herald of Ansurek - [扭曲思绪]
Covert Webmancer - [愈合之网]
Sureki Unnaturaler - [虚空之波]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [虚空奔袭]
Royal Venomshell - [毒性喷吐]

[震地猛击] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.Use ‍Celestial Brew or ‍Dampen Harm whenever tanking the first one.Do not use ‍Diffuse Magic while you are afflicted by ‍Seismic Reverberation.
[震地回响] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [石盾].
The goal is to tank the first [震地猛击] and get dispelled to receive [石盾] for the following one.
[不稳定尖刺] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[折光射线] targets random players which can then clear the [不稳定尖刺].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
[结晶猛击] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [结晶喷发] debuff fall off between kills.
[无常碾压] summons [不稳定的能量] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[排放口]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [废料颂].
[熔铁之水]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
Use [迅如猛虎] to dispel this debuff if the cast went off.
[废料颂]
Move the boss to the side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[炽焰波峰]
Similar to [废料颂], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[火成岩锤]
Deals high magic damage. Use [天神酒] or any other defensive when possible.
[虚空腐蚀]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [虚空裂隙].
Place [魂体双分] before bringing the debuff to the portal so you can [魂体双分: Transfer] back to the boss and keep him more in the middle of the room.
Use [迅如猛虎] on slower classes such as Priests while they carry the debuff to a portal.
Since you're a tank, let your team mates clear their debuff first before clearing your own debuff, use defensives such as [躯不坏], [散魔功] or [壮胆酒] if needed.
[熵能清算]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [咆哮恐惧]
Void Bound Howler - [穿透哀嚎]
Forgebound Mender - [愈合金属]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Void Bound Despoiler - [虚空爆发]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [大地爆发] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[黑暗降临]
When flying out and coming back be ready to interrupt [暗影箭].
[黑曜光束]
This mechanic's initial hit always hits you as a tank.
It deals a lot of damage so make sure you press a defensive here.
[塌缩之夜]
Targets 2 ranged players if available and spawns void zones under them.
Tank the boss towards the edge of the platform and rotate whenever this happens to min-max the room.
[暗黑法球]
Tank the boss in an open space so the orb can be aimed as far away as possible.
[恐惧猛击]
Find a corner to stand against so the knock-up is prevented as much as possible.
Use [天神酒] on every single one of these.
[活化暗影]
Spawns Animate Shadows that cast [凝结黑暗].
Be ready to pick up aggro and interrupt them if needed.
Use [扫堂腿] to stun them when stacked up.
[阿拉希炸弹]
The explosion does a lot of damage [散魔功] is recommended if it goes off.
[酸蚀喷发]
Interrupt this after flying to the boss to start stage 2.
[粘稠迸发]
This prevents you from moving away from the boss. Make sure you always stick to the boss and never leave melee.
[喷射丝线]
Help players who get this mechanic with [迅如猛虎].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Nightfall Shadowmage - [诱捕暗影]
Nightfall Commander - [深渊嗥叫]
Nightfall Darkcaster - [折磨射线]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Anub'ikkaj and Ixkreten the Unbreakable - [恐惧猛击]
Nightfall Dark Architect - [招引增援]
Nightfall Commander - [污邪斩击]
Anub'ikkaj and Deathscreamer Iken'tak - [暗黑法球]
Anub'ikkaj and Ascendant Vis'coxria - [晦影腐朽]
[灵魂之箭]
Interrupt this cast whenever possible.
[憎恨之容]
Place a [魂体双分] before to get back fast for an interrupt on the boss.
[黑暗之拥]
Forces you to hit Droman Oulfarran.
[迷乱花粉]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.
[宗主之怒]
Save damage abilities for this phase.
[拍手手]
This cast is solely for you and needs to be interrupted by you.
[鬼抓人]
Summons Illusionary Vulpin fixating [鬼抓人锁定] on a player.
If not touched or spawned far away use [分筋错骨] to CC it.
[加速孵化]
Summons Gormling Larva, make sure to pick them up and bring them under the boss for cleave damage.
[被标记的猎物] makes them fixate on a player so support them with your slows.
Use [平心之环] right before the Gormling Larva die, to move them away from the group, since they leave a pool on the ground after death.
[心灵连接]
This ability will always go on you now. Use [迅如猛虎] or [滚地翻] to break the links.
[凝结毒素]
This creates a big circle around to boss while sucking you in. Run against it to not die.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Drust Harvester - [收割精魂]
Mistveil Tender - [滋养森林]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [模拟抗性]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Drust Spiteclaw - [濒死之息]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Tirnenn Villager - [过度生长]
Drust Boughbreaker - [愤怒鞭笞]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Guardian - [心能挥砍]
Big tank buster, rotate your defensives for it.
[深重呕吐]
Spawns Carrion Worm, utilize your slows while killing these.
Use [平心之环] to keep them away from group members.
[恶臭气体]
Position the boss close to other pools to maximize room usage as Fetid Gas creates a pool under the boss.
[嚼碎]
Physical tank hit.
[亡者领域]
Move the boss close to the Reanimated Crosbowman while interrupting the Reanimated Mage.
Use [平心之环] to get any far away adds closer to each other.
[扫堂腿] the adds when the boss is free-casting [通灵箭].
[邪恶狂乱]
If your group cant purge this Enrage effect, watch your health since the boss starts doing a lot more damage.
[通灵箭]
Interrupt this as much as possible.
[唤醒造物]
Always make sure to pick up Stitchflesh's Creation. They spawn in one of the back corners of the room looking at the boss.
Position the Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle of the room to make aiming [肉钩] easy.
[肉钩]
Use [迅如猛虎] on the [肉钩] target.
[劈肉]
Physical tank hit.
[逃脱]
After this is cast position Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle.
[彗星风暴]
Stack up with your melees to dodge this mechanic together.
[寒冰碎片]
This tank hit is being cast at you all the time and does high physical damage to you.
[冻结之缚]
This can be dispelled by your [迅如猛虎].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [排干体液]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [严酷命运]
Zolramus Sorcerer - [暗影之井]
Move when this ability is being casted to avoid getting hit.
[上钩了]
The boss is fixating on players and is not tankable. You are responsible for the adds.
Help out the fixated player with [迅如猛虎] if needed.
Every 25% boss HP he calls in 1 Irontide Cleaver and 1 Irontide Powdershot
Irontide Cleaver
[沉重挥砍]
Aim this frontal away from any team member and any [重型军火].
Irontide PowdershotDrag the Irontide Cleaver close and focus them down use ‍Ring of Peace to get them in.
Is standing still most of the time casting [炽热弹头]
[重型军火].
If your team fails to kite the boss through all 3 bombs on the ground, make sure to soak the remaining ones before the timer goes off.
[大规模轰炸]
Applies [瞄准火炮], move with your melee team.
[清扫甲板]
This is a very fast frontal so aim it away from any players.
[紧急回避] - Be ready to pick up the following adds:
Ashvane Deckhand
[腥红横扫]

[锻造武器] - Summons one of the following 3 weapons:‍Molten FlurryPhysical damage cast while applying ‍Molten Spark to party members.‍Fiery CleaveThis frontal can be baited by anyone in the group. Bait this into a wall if possible.

Kite the boss during this duration, don't tank him.

General Tips
Always dispel [裹体之网] targets instantly.
Ramp up with several [氤氲之雾] before each [蛛纱强袭] and [警示尖鸣].
General Tips
As [警示尖鸣] does physical damage, only [壮胆酒] works to reduce its damage here. So you should then use [散魔功] to survive [蛛纱强袭] because it's Nature damage taken.
Use [移花接木] as the first line of emergency defensives, whenever you drop to low HP.
General Tips
Always stay close to the boss as it otherwise becomes harder to dodge [穿刺] the further you are away.
General Tips
Rotate through your healing cds to heal through the damage done by [感染]. When you are out of cds ramp up with some  [氤氲之雾] to try and outheal the damage.
General Tips
Whenever you don't have any cooldowns left it's the best time to use your [作茧缚命] and communicate with your party about using their defensives.
General Tips
Be careful using [迅如猛虎] when soaking [抓握之血], since it will free you of that blood that roots you and potentially drag you to your death by [宇宙奇点].
Always dispel one [培植毒药] as this dot does heavy damage.
General Tips
Rotate through your defensive and use [作茧缚命] when you are affected by [培植毒药].

[警示尖鸣] does a good amount of AoE damage and summons 4 eggs stacked in a corner of the room. These eggs hatch into Starved Crawler, who then cast [饥肠辘辘] and fixate on the other players in your group.
Your goal is to keep the the boss away from them because if Avanoxx gets close she eats them and gets a stack of [贪得无厌] per Crawler eaten.
The boss receiving any stack of [贪得无厌] likely results in a wipe.
[蛛纱强袭] spawns [邪恶缠网] under every player while being cast so stacking up with your group or melee friend is  recommended to conserve space.
[贪食撕咬] is the tank mechanic, hitting you for 3 strikes back to back inflicting a 50% damage taken increase per stack which ends up being a 150% damage taken increase for the following melee swings.
Rotating strong defensives for this boss is wise at this mechanic hurts a lot and the boss can be very scary because of it.
Its very wise to [圣盾术] or [远古列王守卫] the overlap of [贪食撕咬] and [警示尖鸣] as it does very life threatening damage combined.
[穿刺] is aimed at you while tanking the boss, resulting in a huge frontal cone that you can aim. You don't need to tank this mechanic but you need to aim it away from the team as best as possible.
[钻地冲击]
The boss targets a player in your group and proceeds to goes underground and charge that player, immediately afterwards he casts [穿刺] so make sure to aim that frontal well.
[感染] spawns a [无休虫群], just don't stand in it.
You can [圣盾术] before [感染] runs out so it does not spawn [无休虫群].
During [虫群之眼] the boss creates a zone in front of the boss that is a "safe space". It moves together with the bosses' facing, so you are responsible for moving the zone around.
[穿刺] is being cast during the phase making the "safe zone" even smaller. Make sure you aim it at either side of the safe zone and not in the middle.
Throughout the fight Bloodstained Webmage spawn casting [流丝束缚] at someone random during the fight.
Make sure to drag the boss close to them to cleave them down.
[宇宙奇点] requires you to stand in [抓握之血] while the cast is finishing.
Get rid of this mechanic with [自由祝福] after [宇宙奇点] has ended.
[培植毒药] does a lot of damage to you while also shooting out waves to dodge when it expires.
Use [远古列王守卫] or [炽热防御者] to tank this mechanic.
You can also pre-use [圣盾术] and [破咒祝福] to immune the application.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Trilling Attendant - [共振弹幕]
Ixin - [惊惧尖鸣]
Bloodstained Webmage - [恶臭齐射]
Blood Overseer - [毒液箭雨]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Sentry Stagshell - [预警尖鸣]
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard - [野蛮猛击]
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
[压迫之链] creates a circle around the boss preventing anyone from moving more than 10 yards away from the boss. You are responsible for dragging the boss and the team around so keep that in mind.
[压制] is a big magical tank hit that reduces your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds after being hit.
Rotate [破咒祝福] and [圣盾术] to deal with this mechanic and immune the damage and slow effect.
Moreover, cast strong defensives and then cast[自由祝福] to remove the slow.
[惊魂恫吓] is not a tank frontal so you can dodge it when it happens.
[疑之影] creates balls to dodge when dispelled, make sure to dodge these.
If you would get hit use [圣盾术] to break the stun.
[喧神教化] is a big group AoE mechanic that creates [残存影响] after being cast.
Move the boss quickly after this cast is finished to guarantee no one stands in the pool on the ground afterwards.

The first tank mechanic, [邃影斩] from Nx, deals damage to you and leaves behind an echo of the boss. You want to move the boss out of this echo as [暮落] creates a big circle AoE around the boss and any echo left behind.
[协同步法] happens at 100 Energy. The 2 bosses jump away and swap their ability sets.
After Vx becomes the attacker, the other tank mechanic [霜凝匕首] activates. It does a bigger hit to you and applies [冰冻之血] which makes stacking together with your group mandatory to remove this debuff.
Immuning [冰冻之血] with [圣盾术] and [破咒祝福] can be very useful.
[黏稠黑暗] summons orbs around the room that need to be soaked before they touch the boss.
[腐化附层] get applied by soaking a orb.
[圣盾术] and [破咒祝福] immunes the application of [腐化附层].
[溢流猛击] is the magic tank hit which slows you afterwards.
Pre use [自由祝福] to deal with this.
[血之激涌]
Position the Boss at the edge of the room to maximize the amount of usable space as [血之激涌] creates a pool under the boss.
[变易异常] shoots 3 orbs towards players for this mechanic. Make sure to keep the boss together with the whole group and dodge as a group when needed.
[捻接]
Can be immuned with [破咒祝福] and [圣盾术].
[震颤猛击]
This mechanic requires you to run out of melee and be ready to pick up aggro on the Ravenous Scarab spawning afterwards.
[晦幽纺纱]
Applies webs to all players in the group, rooting them unless destroyed. As with [变易异常], keep the boss close to your group.
[自由祝福] is very useful to remove the roots.
[汰劣程序]
This mechanic creates a big circle around you that can not hit anyone but yourself. Step away from the team to not hit them while tanking this mechanic.
Rotate [炽热防御者] and [远古列王守卫] to survive.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Sureki Silkbinder - [流丝缠缚]
Herald of Ansurek - [扭曲思绪]
Covert Webmancer - [愈合之网]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Eye of the Queen - [虚空奔袭]
Royal Venomshell - [毒性喷吐]

[震地猛击] does massive physical damage to you and is very dangerous.Just ‍Ardent Defender is enough to live the hit, but you will be low health afterwards so be careful. Do not use ‍Divine Shield unless you would otherwise die since it immunes ‍Seismic Reverberation.
[震地回响] is applied after tanking the hit.
This debuff is a magic dot that can be dispelled.
When dispelled you gain [石盾].
The goal is to tank the first [震地猛击] and get dispelled to receive [石盾] for the following one.
[不稳定尖刺] spawns spikes under 3 random players. For this stack up with your group.
[折光射线] targets random players which can then clear the [不稳定尖刺].
Position the boss in a line towards the spikes to make clearing easy.
With [圣盾术] you can immune the [不稳定尖刺] debuff stacks.
[结晶猛击] summons 3 Crystal Shards around the room.
Move the boss from Crystal Shard to Crystal Shard and kill them one after another while letting the [结晶喷发] debuff fall off between kills.
[无常碾压] summons [不稳定的能量] per player.
Don't soak these as a tank, leave them for your DPS and Healer.
[排放口]
Creates flame pools on the ground. Check early for a safe space for [废料颂].
[熔铁之水]
Help interrupt this mechanic.
[废料颂]
Move the boss to side of the room to avoid the cube in the middle of the room.
[炽焰波峰]
Similar to [废料颂], position the boss at one of the tips of the cube to avoid the lava waves.
[火成岩锤]
Deals high magic damage. Rotate every defensive for each one and be inside [奉献] or you will perish.
[虚空腐蚀]
Applies a debuff to you that you need to clear with [虚空裂隙].
Immune the application of it with [圣盾术] whenever possible.
[熵能清算]
Drop a zone when the cast is finished so be sure to place your circle at the edge of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ghastly Voidsoul - [咆哮恐惧]
Void Bound Howler - [穿透哀嚎]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Void Bound Despoiler - [虚空爆发]
Forge Loader - [熔岩迫击炮]
Rock Smasher - [巨岩碾压]
Cursedforge Honor Guard - [重盾奔袭]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Earth Burst Totem casts [大地爆发] which needs to be killed before it goes off.
[黑暗降临]
When flying out and coming back be ready to interrupt [暗影箭].
[黑曜光束]
This mechanic's initial hit always hits you as a tank.
It deals a lot of damage so make sure you press a defensive here.
[塌缩之夜]
Targets 2 ranged players if available and spawns void zones under them.
Tank the boss towards the edge of the platform and rotate whenever this happens to min max the room.
[暗黑法球]
Tank the boss in an open space so the orb can be aimed as far away as possible.
[恐惧猛击]
Find a corner to stand against so the knockup is prevented as much as possible.
Use [圣盾术] to immune the knockup.
[活化暗影]
Spawns Animate Shadows that cast [凝结黑暗].
Be ready to pick up aggro and interrupt them if needed.
Saving [寒冷之焰] for this is quite wise.
[阿拉希炸弹]
The explosion can be immuned by [圣盾术].
[酸蚀喷发]
Interrupt this after flying to the boss to start stage 2.
[粘稠迸发]
This prevents you from moving away from the boss. Make sure you always stick to the boss and never leave melee.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Nightfall Shadowmage - [诱捕暗影]
Nightfall Commander - [深渊嗥叫]
Nightfall Darkcaster - [折磨射线]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Anub'ikkaj and Ixkreten the Unbreakable - [恐惧猛击]
Nightfall Dark Architect - [招引增援]
Anub'ikkaj and Deathscreamer Iken'tak - [暗黑法球]
Anub'ikkaj and Ascendant Vis'coxria - [晦影腐朽]
[灵魂之箭]
Interrupt this cast whenever possible.
[憎恨之容]
This fear can be immuned  with [圣盾术].
[黑暗之拥]
Forces you to hit Droman Oulfarran.
[迷乱花粉]
This frontal is aimed at you so don't aim it at the ranged team.
[宗主之怒]
Save damage abilities for this phase.
[拍手手]
This cast is solely for you and needs to be interrupted by you.
[鬼抓人]
Summons Illusionary Vulpin fixating [鬼抓人锁定] on a player.
Use [制裁之锤] to stun them when they spawn.
[吞噬]
Interrupt this after breaking the shield on the boss.
[加速孵化]
Summons Gormling Larva, make sure to pick them up and bring them under the boss for cleave damage.
[被标记的猎物] makes them fixate on a player. Help them with [保护祝福] and [牺牲祝福] if needed.
[心灵连接]
Utilize [圣盾术] to immune the link on you.
[凝结毒素]
This creates a big circle around to boss while sucking you in. Run against it to not die.
Use [神圣马驹] to run against the pull in.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Drust Harvester - [收割精魂]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [模拟抗性]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Drust Spiteclaw - [濒死之息]
This debuffs enemies as well as players.
Tirnenn Villager - [过度生长]
Drust Boughbreaker - [愤怒鞭笞]
Triggers at 50% HP of the Drust Boughbreaker.
Mistveil Defender - [迷雾结界]
Big zone to move the enemies out of.
Mistveil Stalker - [纱雾噬咬]
Mistveil Stinger - [心能注入]
Spinemaw Staghorn - [酸性新星]
[深重呕吐]
Spawns Carrion Worm, use [制裁之锤] to stun one and [盲目之光] to cancel their cast on your allies.
[恶臭气体]
Position the boss close to other pools to maximize room usage as Fetid Gas creates a pool under the boss.
[嚼碎]
Physical tank hit that you should try and rotate defensives for and use [荣耀圣令] to heal yourself instantly afterwards.
[亡者领域]
Move the boss close to the Reanimated Crosbowman while interrupting the Reanimated Mage.
[邪恶狂乱]
If your group cant purge this Enrage effect, watch your health since the boss starts doing a lot more damage.
[通灵箭]
Interrupt this as much as possible.
[唤醒造物]
Always make sure to pick up Stitchflesh's Creation. They spawn in one of the back corners of the room looking at the boss.
Position the Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle of the room to make aiming [肉钩] easy.
[劈肉]
Physical tank hit.
[逃脱]
After this is cast position Stitchflesh's Creation in the middle.
[彗星风暴]
Stack up with your melees to dodge this mechanic together.
[寒冰碎片]
This tank hit is being cast at you all the time and does high physical damage to you.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Corpse Harvester - [排干体液]
Stitched Vanguard - [血肉之盾]
Skeletal Marauder - [刺耳尖啸]
Corpse Collector - [瘀液喷撒]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Zolramus Necromancer - [严酷命运]
Skeletal Marauder - [恐怖顺劈]
Fast frontal cast.
Flesh Crafter - [切肉飞刀]
This spell also does damage to enemies and should be aimed at any enemy to deal extra damage.
Help with this by positioning the mobs in front of the Flesh Crafter.
Loyal Creation - [脊锤重压]
A big circle cast that can't be disrupted as it recasts until the cast is finished once.
[上钩了]
The boss is fixating on players and is not tankable. You are responsible for the adds.
Every 25% boss HP he calls in 1 Irontide Cleaver and 1 Irontide Powdershot
Irontide Cleaver
[沉重挥砍]
Aim this frontal away from any team member and any [重型军火].
Irontide PowdershotDrag the Irontide Cleaver close and focus the Irontide Powdershot down.
Is standing still most of the time casting [炽热弹头]
[大规模轰炸]
Applies [瞄准火炮], move with your melee team.
[炽烈弹射]
Avoid stacking up on this mechanic.
[清扫甲板]
This is a very fast frontal so aim it away from any players.
[紧急回避] - Be ready to pick up the following adds:
Ashvane Deckhand
[腥红横扫]
Another fast frontal to aim away.
Ashvane Cannoneer
[舷侧攻击]
Long cast frontal that should be aimed away from the group.
[易爆军火]
Pick this up and use the ExtraActionButton to shoot the boss down.
[毁灭之潮]
A frontal that needs to be aimed away from the group whenever possible.
[激流破奔]
Bait the water pools away from the statue in the middle.
[海潮涌动]
Summons 2 waves that need to be dodged back to back. Be ready to move the boss to a safe spot and aim [毁灭之潮] away from the group when it is about to be cast as this can be a deadly overlap.
[腐败之水]
Remove this debuff with [圣盾术]. Furthermore, you can help mitigate the damage the person who doesnt get dispelled recieves with [破咒祝福].
Demolishing Terror‍SlamThis knocks you back. Walk back to the Demolishing Terror afterwards.
[甲板破碎者]
Don't leave melee of the Demolishing Terror.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Ashvane Commander - [强化怒吼]
Bilge Rat Tempest - [窒息之水]
Bilge Rat Pillager - [恶臭喷吐]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Scrimshaw Enforcer - [抽脸者]
Casted frontal cone that is hard to see.
Irontide Raider - [铁钩] into [狂野风暴]
Blacktar Bomber - [火焰炸弹]
Ashvane Commander - [艾泽里特炸药]
Irontide Powdershot - [炽热弹头]
Ashvane Spotter - [瞄准火炮]
Bilge Rat Demolisher - [碾压重击]
[碎颅打击]
Deals 2 instances of physical damage over 2 seconds, while also applying a bleed to you.
Remove the bleed with [圣盾术] or [保护祝福] or even [石像形态].
[命令咆哮]
Summons [暗影烈焰吐息] so be sure to position the boss in the safe lane.

[锻造武器] - Summons one of the following 3 weapons:‍Molten FlurryPhysical damage cast while applying ‍Molten Spark to party members.‍Fiery CleaveThis frontal can be baited by anyone in the group. Bait this into a wall if possible.
[熔岩重锤]
Kite the boss during this duration, don't tank him.
While walking he leaves behind [熔岩池] so kite him at the edge of the room.
[暗影烈焰祈祷]
Invoked Shadowflame Spirit casts [烈焰凝视].
Stun them with [制裁之锤] and focus them down.
[暗影烈焰箭]
This cast is always on you, interrupt when it is ready.
[暮光打击]‍Twilight Wind spawns after, drag away from them to make it easy for the group.
Position the boss in a new corner whenever [暮光打击] is coming up.
[噬体烈焰]
This frontal breath is always aimed at you, position it away from the group into a wall if possible.
[暗影飓风]
Position the boss in the middle of this circle and adjust when it starts shrinking.
[虚空涌动]
Summons Void Tendril
Immune [深渊之攫] to clear Void Tendrils with [圣盾术].
[虚空灌输]
Summons Twilight Hatchling
When killed they explode with [暗影之伤].
[碾碎]
Physical and magical damage hit. This knocks you back so watch out for Void Tendrils.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Twilight Earthcaller - [剧烈震颤]
Twilight Beguiler - [思维链]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Twilight Destroyer - [晦暗之风]
You can LoS this cast.
Twilight Overseer - [鲁莽战术]
Purge it if needed.
Molten Giant - [熔岩觉醒]
Use [圣佑术] or [复仇之盾] on [警示尖鸣].
Avoid kiting Starved Crawlers into the boss else the boss receives [贪得无厌].
Use [制裁之锤] if there is 1 left or if one is close to the boss.
AoE them down as soon as possible.
Follow your group to bait [蛛纱强袭] on the edge of the platform.
Use [自由祝福] on higher stacks of [邪恶缠网] as to not get [裹体之网].
Do not stand in front of the boss when it casts [穿刺] which is a big frontal cone.
Interrupt with [责难] when a Bloodstained Webmage is casting [流丝束缚].This add needs to die fast as to not get to many at the same time as your group only has a certain amount of interupts.
If you see any cast not being interrupted use [自由祝福] on the player targeted to remove the root effect.
Use [神圣马驹] if you are targeted by [钻地冲击] so as to not get hit by the charge.
For a short time the boss is casting a lot of [穿刺] on players which you have to dodge, so if you find yourself in danger use [圣盾术] or [召唤食尸鬼] to immune the damage.
Boss casts [虫群之眼] at 100 energy which creates a big circle you must stand in.
Use defensive while you're affected by [培植毒药] since it hits like a truck!
Make sure to cast [清毒术] to remove this debuff, but be careful not to hit anyone by the lines after its been cleansed.
When you're affected by [抓握之血] you can use [制裁之锤] or [自由祝福] instead of killing it to cancel your root.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[共振弹幕] from Trilling Attendant.
[惊惧尖鸣] from Ixin.
[恶臭齐射] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[毒液箭雨] from Blood Overseer.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[预警尖鸣] from Sentry Stagshell
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
[野蛮猛击] from Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Paladins
Always stack up to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Use [散魔功], [业报之触] or [壮胆酒] whenever multiple [不稳定尖刺] get detonated.
Majority of the damage comes from the bursting effect after detonating the spikes.
Make sure you are topped when the boss casts [大地破裂] with the help of ‍Algari Healing Potion or [活血术].
The highest priority in this fight is killing the  Crystal Shards fast enough before [加固壳壁] is cast to gain  [不稳定的能量] to break the shield fast.
You cannot kill multiple Crystal Shards at the same time due to [结晶喷发].
You can use your [轮回之触] to kill any  Crystal Shards quickly before  [加固壳壁].
Use your [散魔功], [业报之触] or [壮胆酒] before [无常碾压] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
Put Speaker Brokk in focus, so you can use [切喉手] easily.
Try to keep up [神鹤印记] on both bosses to increase your [神鹤引项踢] damage.
During [排放口] 3 out of the 4 vents in the intercardinal directions are active. Look around and locate the safe vent and go there quickly to not get cut off by puddles on the ground.
The [熔岩波] from the cube will always traverse in the cardinal directions so as long as you are on a vent you are in a safespot.
Use your defensive during [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Killing both bosses at the same time is a must to avoid [沉默代言人].
Putting down your [魂体双分] in the middle of the room is a great tool to get quickly back to the boss after dropping [熵灭] from [熵能清算].
Place your [魂体双分] in the middle of the room to quickly teleport back after dropping [熵灭] from [熵能清算].
Use [散魔功], [业报之触] or [壮胆酒] on [熵能清算].
Make sure to cleanse off [虚空腐蚀] by going to a [虚空裂隙].

Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[噤声齿轮] from Turned Speaker.
[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[弧形虚空] from Cursedheart Invader.
Always stack up to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Depending on the key level you might need to have a defensive up for this ability.
Rotate your defensives for [大地破裂].
Run out when the boss casts [无常碾压].
You can use [神圣马驹] to quickly get out.
Make sure to instantly kill the Crystal Shards.
Use your defensive before [无常碾压] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
Make sure to kill them both at the same time!
Interrupt Speaker Brokk with [责难] when it casts [熔铁之水].
Rotate your defensives during [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Drop off your [虚空腐蚀] within 15 yards of a [虚空裂隙].
Use [神圣马驹] to quickly remove this.
Do not stand in front of the boss when it casts [无拘虚空] which is a big frontal cone.
Use your defensive on [熵能清算].
Make sure to not drop any pool in the middle of the room.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[噤声齿轮] from Turned Speaker.
[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.

Paladins
Interrupt [暗影箭] with [责难].
If you're low on hp and you see this not being interrupted consider using a defensive.
Rotate your defensives if you're affected by [塌缩之夜]. Getting out of this quickly is important since it deals a lot of damage every 0.5 seconds.
When the boss casts[黑暗降临] quickly get on your flying mount and fly off the ship until the cast is finished.
Quickly move out to position the [暗黑法球] path.
Use [神圣马驹] to have more time to get into position.
Move away from the tank when the boss casts [恐惧猛击] to not get feared.
Stun and interrupt [活化暗影].
Rotate your defensives for the [暗黑法球] and [晦影腐朽].

Make sure to rotate your defensives when these break.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[暗夜箭] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[诱捕暗影] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
Paladins
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted.
Make sure to dodge [迷乱花粉] and if you find yourself without a safe place to dodge quickly use [圣盾术].
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Stun the Illusionary Vulpins with [制裁之锤] to prevent them from reaching their target.
Be careful as to not get too close to the Vulpin as the hitbox is very large.
Rotate your defensives during the [猜谜游戏].
Use [神圣马驹] to help you break the [心灵连接] quickly.
Rotate your defensives during [吞噬].
Try to stand close to the tank if you have [被标记的猎物] as the Glooming Larvas fixate towards you, this makes it easier for the group to quickly stun and kill them.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.
[滋养森林] from Mistveil Tender.
[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.
[再生鼓舞] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[模拟抗性] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
Paladins
[圣佑术] if you're targeted by [深重呕吐].
Make sure to face this away from the group.
Kite and kill the Carrion Worms.
If any of them get to close make sure to stun it with [制裁之锤].
Interrupt [通灵箭] with [责难].
Stun any of the Reanimated Crossbowman or Reanimated Mage with ‍[制裁之锤].
Since they are undead the stun effect from ‍[灰烬觉醒] also works here.
If any adds are still alive during ‍[最终收割], use any crowd-control spell you have left on them. With them crowd-controlled, the boss doesn't cast ‍[折磨回响] even though an add is alive.
Make sure that Surgeon Stitchflesh gets hit by [肉钩] throughout the fight.
You can use [召唤食尸鬼] if you get [病态凝视].
You can pre cast [自由祝福] on another player, which allows you to immune the [冻结之缚].
Try to run in a circle during [彗星风暴] to not run over anyone.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.
[通灵箭] from Zolramus Sorceror & Zolarmus Necromancer.
[刺耳尖啸] from Skeletal Marauder.
[寒冰箭雨] from Reanimated Mage.
[瘀液喷撒] from Corpse Collector.
[修复血肉] from Flesh Crafter.
Paladins
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs which afflict him with [重型军火].
Do not stand in front of the Irontide Cleavers when they cast [沉重挥砍] which is a big frontal cone.
[神圣马驹] helps you to quickly kite the boss into Bombs.
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the phase change to quickly use [易爆军火] to get the boss down from the ship.
The boss turns to a player and casts [清扫甲板] a frontal cone that knocks back anyone in front of her.
Use your defensives during [炽烈弹射]
Rotate your defensives on [wow-spell id=257882]Break Water.
Since they spawn under you, make sure to not spawn any close to the pillar as you are going to use it for [海潮涌动].
If you can't find a safe spot for [海潮涌动] you can also use [圣盾术] to immune the damage.
The boss casts [毁灭之潮] on the tank which is a massive frontal cone.
Rotate your defensives if you are targeted by [腐败之水].
If you run out of defensives you can use [圣盾术] to immune it off.
Make sure to kill the Gripping Terrors as fast as you can while not leaving more than 1 Demolishing Terror up at a time.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[盐渍飞弹] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[防水甲壳] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[水箭] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[强化怒吼] from Ashvane Commander.
Paladins
Use [复仇之盾] before [命令咆哮].
Use [神圣马驹] during [命令咆哮] to quickly find the save spot to dodge the [暗影烈焰吐息].
Use [圣佑术] on [突岩尖刺].
Drop this off away from the group.
Rotate your defensives every time the boss casts [锻造武器].
During the axe phase the boss is going to target a player with [烈火斩] a massive frontal cone you must dodge.
During [熔火乱舞] if you are targeted by [熔浆火花] make sure to drop it off far away or on the side of the group.
During [熔岩重锤] you can use [自由祝福] on the tank to speed him up.
In phase 1 interrupt [暗影烈焰箭] with [责难].
Use [圣疗术] If targeted by [熵能诅咒].
Rotate your defensives when the boss casts [暮光打击].
The boss is going to target a player and cast [噬体烈焰] a massive frontal cone you must dodge.
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
Help your group by soaking the Void tendrils with [圣盾术] simply run over them to soak.
If you're hit by a Void tendril it stuns you.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
Paladins
You can drop the fixate with [消失], while also double dipping on the use by spreading your dots with [连环屠戮] on them. Ideally you only do this on a hard wave.
Alternatively you can use [闪避] and tank them.
Always avoid [钻地冲击].
You can use your [佯攻] with [难觅行踪] or [闪避] with [诱导转向] to lower the damage of [感染].
[脚踢] and kill Bloodstained Webmages asap
Use your [佯攻] if you are talented into [难觅行踪] or [闪避] with [诱导转向] while you're affected by [培植毒药] since it hits like a truck!
Also, try to position yourself in a way so that when the waves go out, they don't hit any of your party members.
When the boss starts casting [宇宙奇点], run into one of the black puddles on the ground before the cast ends. Generally, you have a bit of time, so don't waste too much uptime, but also play it safe.
Once you get into a puddle, you will be rooted in place with [抓握之血]. After the boss cast is done, use any form of CC such as [致盲]  on the add to free yourself off the root.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[共振弹幕] from Trilling Attendant.
[惊惧尖鸣] from Ixin.
[恶臭齐射] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[毒液箭雨] from Blood Overseer.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[预警尖鸣] from Sentry Stagshell
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
[野蛮猛击] from Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.

When you get[疑之影] try to position yourself in a way so that you don't hit any of your party members.

Use your [佯攻] for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
Soak the dark orbs so that they don't heal the boss.
Use your [暗影步] after the knockback to gain uptime on the boss.
Using your [消失] on the [晦幽纺纱] root is decent as you get to multi-dot the remaining of them if the rest of the group hasn't cleared them.
Use your defensives for [捻接] since it's the highest damage event during this fight.

While you are moving towards the add that needs to die, make sure to watch the boss for the lines as they can be very deadly if you get hit by multiple, and its easy forget about them with the boss at the opposite side of the room.
You can try to stay on your tank to minimize movement on this fight. Generally, the boss's hitbox is very small and you want to minimize the amount of spread from [酸蚀排放].
With [心灵连接] being always on tank now, try to look for the timer and spread out before it happens.
Multidot the adds as they come closer, you can save your [消失] for that point.
If you apply your [死亡猎手标记] on Tirnenn Villagers before first boss you will need to proc [深度腐蚀] sometime around 25%-30%, and save it since they go friendly at 20% and don't die.

Ideally you proc a [深度腐蚀] on the add before Surgeon Stitchflesh comes down to not lose your [死亡猎手标记]. If you have [消失] free, you can also just [伏击] instead and then Apply the buffed [锁喉].

This is one of the hardest bosses to keep your [[死亡猎手标记]] on since you get sent down so fast. You could look at the timer and wait with your Darkest Night a bit. Otherwise if you end up losing your 死亡猎手标记, just use your [消失] on the boss when you get back up.

General Tips
Dispel [燃烧之影] as fast as possible.
General Tips
Whenever you dispel [燃烧之影] your party gets a a dot with a healing absorb
Use a healing cooldown whenever [暗影之幕] is active to heal the dot off as fast as possible.
General Tips
There are no planned uses, use personals and [作茧缚命] freely.
General Tips
Make sure if you are targeted by [暗黑法球] to not aim it into a wall, as if it does not travel for a long time you will wipe.
General Tips
[晦影腐朽] happens every 41 seconds, so you have to alternate your healing cooldowns with your defensives and communicate that with your group.
You will have 5 stacks of [烟火爆炸] for every [晦影腐朽], or 10 stacks for every other, plan this out between your other healing cooldowns.
General Tips
Use your personals and [作茧缚命] for every [晦影腐朽].
General Tips
[光芒四射] will make you able to use your dragon riding mount in combat to avoid [渗透暗影]. Make sure to have your mount keybound!
General Tips
You need to heal through [侵蚀喷涌] because people do need their defensive for when they are targeted with [喷射丝线].
General Tips
Use your personals and [作茧缚命] for every [喷射丝线].

Consider using [减速药膏] to keep them slowed.
The [感染] spawns a [无休虫群] which can be very deadly if not looked out for, keep your eyes lock in here to avoid taking extra damage or dying.
Kill Bloodstained Webmages fast and interrupt [流丝束缚].
If a Bloodstained Webmage is casting freely outside of the safe zone, consider using [暗影斗篷] to run and stop it.
Use a defensive while you're affected by [培植毒药], it is applied quite frequently so try to rotate [闪避] and [暗影斗篷] with [佯攻] on top.

If you feel confident in your reaction speed, using [暗影步] on a party member rooted by [[抓握之血]] during the last 0.3 seconds of the [宇宙奇点] channel. This spares you the effort of CCing your own 抓握之血 and increases your uptime.
When you're affected by [抓握之血] you can use any form of crowd control instead of killing it to cancel your root.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[共振弹幕] from Trilling Attendant.
[惊惧尖鸣] from Ixin.

[毒液箭雨] from Blood Overseer.

A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.

Using [暗影之刃] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts can give you some free damage. Make sure to not use a macro for trinkets or [[死亡符记]] when doing this since some trinkets and 死亡符记 do not reset on key start.
Pay extra attention to [疑之影] as this mechanic will most likely kill you if you get hit.
Make sure to position towards wherever the tank is moving during the [喧神教化] to not get hit by the [残存影响].
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
You can [暗影斗篷] or [消失] to get rid off [寒冰镰刀].
Use your defensives for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
You can utilize [暗影斗篷] together with [疾跑] to soak a lot of the [黏稠黑暗] bloods to avoid your group having big heal absorbs.
Pay extra attention to the [变易异常] on this fight since they can be very hard to spot when they move and will likely kill you if you get hit.
Use your defensives for [捻接].
Use [佯攻] for [震颤猛击].

Try to stack the [不稳定尖刺] closely to kill them all with one [折光射线]. Make sure to [佯攻] here or [暗影斗篷] if the situation looks very dire.

[塌缩之夜] seems to prioritize ranged players, if you are however in a melee stacked group, be ready to move away really fast from this mechanic.
The boss casts [黑暗降临] at 50% so make sure to not use any major cooldowns as the boss is about to phase since you have to fly away.
The adds from [活化暗影] have very little HP and shouldn't need to be focused down.

Put the boss on focus to interrupt [灵魂之箭] easily.
You can use [暗影斗篷] to immune the [憎恨之容] cast.
[宗主之怒] causes the boss to take 200% increase damage for 15 seconds, make sure to not use all of your [暗影之舞] before this phase.
You can use [致盲] on the Illusionary Vulpins to prevent them from reaching their target.
Try to use atleast one [暗影之舞] during the [猜谜游戏]. phase to help out your healer.

Don't use [疾跑] or [暗影步] to dodge [酸蚀排放] since the boss predicts your movement and makes it harder to dodge in the future.

You can use both [闪避] or [暗影斗篷] to negate the effects of [深重呕吐].
Consider using [减速药膏] to slow the Carrion Worms.
Try to position good for [袖剑风暴] and weave in and out of melee to avoid getting [血肉饕餮] by the Carrion Worms.
Make sure to look out for [寒冰箭雨] casts from the Reanimated Mages as it does heavy group damage if let through.
If any adds are still alive during [最终收割] use [肾击] or [致盲] to crowd-control them. With them crowd-controlled, the adds don't explode and boss doesn't get the [折磨回响] buff.
If you are not sure of the boss facing during [通灵吐息], press [暗影步] to end up behind him to ensure survival.
Ensure that you are always ready for the [肉钩] to not have any accidents where you miss the boss with the hook.
[缝针] Hurts a lot and is the main mechanic to use defensives for in this fight.
If you get targeted by [病态凝视] and the boss does not get hit by  [肉钩], use [闪避] and tank him.
Additional note for if you are playing[], try to hold your [深度腐蚀] buff for when the boss is about to jump away. You can use it on the adds or simply not use a 7CP [刺骨].
You can use [暗影斗篷] to pre-immune the [冻结之缚], although saving it for [彗星风暴] is gonna be better in most cases.
When you get targeted by [黑暗放逐] you can [消失] and the boss will recast on somebody else or on you again. I wouldn't recommend doing this unless you want to troll your teammates a little bit.
When you do get sent down by [黑暗放逐], use [[闪避]] and kill the Zolramus Siphoner. If 闪避 is on cooldown or you are still dying to him, use a [肾击].

This boss has two intermissions, at 66% and 33% hp, ensure you do not use any major cooldowns before the boss is about to phase. Additional note for when you are playing [] is to try to keep your [深度腐蚀] buff for the intermission phase.

Try to hit atleast 2 targets with [熔岩爆裂] when the Crystal Shards spawn.
Be wary of [结晶喷发].
Use your defensive before [无常碾压] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
Make sure you keep [烈焰震击] on both bosses.
Use your defensive during [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Make sure you drop [熵灭] from [熵能清算] in good postitions or you will run out of room during this fight.
Use your defensive on [熵能清算].

[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.

[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.

You can use [酒精炸药] and [修复损坏的坦克] before the key to generate [漩涡武器] which you can spend on [治疗之涌] to pre-stack [‍Tempest].
Consider using a defensive if you're affected by [塌缩之夜]. Getting out of this quickly is important since it deals a lot of damage every 0.5 seconds.
You can cleanse [燃烧之影] by using [幽魂步] or  [雷霆之爪]. If you are specced into [喷流] you can also use [狂风图腾].
Stun [活化暗影] with [电能图腾].
Use defensives for the [[暗黑法球]] and [[晦影腐朽]]. If you use [星界转移] very late before the 暗黑法球 hits a wall, it can cover some of the 晦影腐朽 aswell, this depends on how far the orb travels.

Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[暗夜箭] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[诱捕暗影] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
You can use [酒精炸药] and [修复损坏的坦克] before the key to generate [漩涡武器] which you can spend on [治疗之涌] to pre-stack [‍Tempest].
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted. Due to [风剪] short CD you should be interrupting majority of the casts.
Use [战栗图腾] whenever [憎恨之容] is being cast.
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Use a [毁灭闪电] just before the boss gets the damage increase for extra [漩涡武器] during the damage increase.
You can use [地缚图腾] to slow the Illusionary Vulpins. You can also specc [妖术] but there are a lot of good talents in this dungeon so it could be hard to get.
Use your defensives during the [猜谜游戏].
Stay far away from your team to quickly break [心灵连接].
Don't over move on the [[酸蚀排放]] as the boss remembers your movement for the next 酸蚀排放 and spawns swirlies in the direction you moved previously.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.

[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.

You can use [酒精炸药] and [修复损坏的坦克] before the key to generate [漩涡武器] which you can spend on [治疗之涌] to pre-stack [‍Tempest].

You can use [地缚图腾] and [延时散弹] to control the Carrion Worms.
Make sure you [风剪] the Reanimated Mages instantly.
If any adds are still alive during [最终收割], try to time a ‍Capacitor Totem. With them crowd-controlled the adds don’t explode and wipe the group despite being alive.
Try to bait [防腐剂] on the sides of the room to make it easier to kite the boss later during [病态凝视].
Be ready to aim [肉钩] towards the boss to pull him down.
Be positioned on the outside of the room so you can instantly get dispelled on [冻结之缚]. If you are playing [幽魂步] you can cleanse it yourself.

[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.

Focus down the Demolishing Terror first on each platform.
You can look if the boss shoots a [腐败之水] towards you and press [石壁图腾] if you see it coming towards you.

General Tips
Always dispel [裹体之网] targets instantly.

Always stay close to the boss as it otherwise becomes harder to dodge [穿刺] the further away you are.

Rotate through your healing arsenal to heal through the damage done by [感染].

Fill holes in your healing cooldowns by using defensives and communicate that to your group.

When you are affected by [抓握之血] you can use any form of crowd control to free yourself, such as [镜像].

Rotate through [星界转移] and [石壁图腾] when you are affected by [培植毒药], and ensure to face correctly to not hit your party once the debuff is removed.

[黏稠黑暗] knocks you. Make sure to not be knocked into an already existing pool!

Use the rest of your healing cooldowns as needed throughout the fight as this encounter requires constant healing.

Ensure to have a personal defensive active when [黑暗脉动] happens. This happens every 70 seconds so you will always have either [星界转移],[石壁图腾] or [高爆油桶] ready.

Stay stacked with your group to maximize [不羁之力束腕] and [洪水] uptime , as this fight has a high HPS requirement.

Ensure to heal your party to 100% health before [震颤猛击] or [晦幽纺纱] to survive the initial damage.
[先祖活力] is important to help your party survive the initial damage, make sure to apply this to everyone in your party except your tank.

Make sure to face your character towards where you want to go if you get targeted by [[突岩尖刺]] as it knocks you in that direction. Try to also position yourself properly as it spawns [滚石] that covers the floor and makes the fight hard to play if not placed correctly. 突岩尖刺 can also be [消失] to completely negate the mechanic.
This boss has a lot of AoE damage and is both a defensive check and healer check. [锻造武器] and [熔浆火花] overlaps are very dangerous and needs a defensive.
Make sure to place the pool from [熔浆火花] in a good position, ideally next to old fire puddles where you will not be moving.
Use [佯攻] for the [暮光打击]. It sometimes overlaps with [熵能诅咒], consider using [暗影斗篷] for those overlaps.
The [暗影烈焰祈祷] Invoked Shadowflame Spirits have quite long attack range, be careful when attacking these and never move towards them before you are aware of who's fixated.
Use [佯攻] during [深渊腐蚀].
Avoid Void Tendrils at all costs, as you get affected by [深渊之攫] if you walk into one.
Do not kill the Mutated Hatchlings before the [深渊腐蚀] happens as they will give you a massive damage taken increase [暗影之伤].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
The [晦暗之风] cast by Twilight Drakes can be line of sighed, meaning if you tank it near a corner you can hide for each cast.

Using [暗影之刃] and ‍Tempered Potion before the key starts can give you some free damage. Make sure to not use a macro for trinkets or [[死亡符记]] when doing this since some trinkets and 死亡符记 do not reset on key start.
Help out your healer by dispelling [疑之影] with your Imp's [烧灼驱魔].
Use your defensives during [喧神教化].
[爆燃冲刺] helps you dodge [惊魂恫吓].
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
You can either dispel [寒冰镰刀] with [烧灼驱魔] or cleanse it with [灵魂燃烧：恶魔法阵].
Make sure to position yourself close to the boss to maximise cleave uptime since [暗影瞬步] targets a random player.
Use your defensives for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
Keep an eye on tank movement and make sure to not outrange the boss or your healer.

[变易异常] move onto players location. Thus it is recommended to move together as a group throughout the whole fight to dodge the mechanic easier as it's going to be much more predictable. As a bonus it is also going to be easier to deal with [晦幽纺纱] this way.
Make sure to always have [邪恶污染] ready for [晦幽纺纱] to help your team and yourself get rid of the webs.
Use your defensives for [捻接] since it's the highest damage event during this fight.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[蛛网箭] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[阴织冲击] from Covert Webmancer.
[愈合之网] from Covert Webmancer.
[扭曲思绪] from Herald of Anurek. Good target for [语言诅咒].
[虚空之波] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Always cast [灵魂石] on the tank or healer before the key starts as it stays active and might come in handy.

Use [[邪能统御]] shortly before starting the dungeon. Starting a dungeon despawns your pet, and this enables you to rapidly summon your pet without spending a [灵魂碎片] while still having 邪能统御 off cooldown in case your pet dies later.
Always stack up to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Use [黑暗契约] whenever it's ready for this ability.
Use [不灭决心] for [大地破裂].
Utilize your Imp's [烧灼驱魔] to dispel [震地回响] off of your tank.
Dispel it right before [震地猛击] to give your tank the 50% damage reduction from [石盾].
Be careful with killing Crystal Shards as they explode upon destruction dealing damage to all players.

Use defensive while you're affected by [培植毒药] since it hits like a truck!
When you're affected by [抓握之血] you can use any form of crowd control instead of killing it to cancel your root.

[共振弹幕] from Trilling Attendant.
[惊惧尖鸣] from Ixin.
[恶臭齐射] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[毒液箭雨] from Blood Overseer.

Use [[邪能统御]] shortly before starting the dungeon. Starting a dungeon despawns your pet, and this enables you to rapidly summon your pet without spending a [灵魂碎片] while still having 邪能统御 off cooldown in case your pet dies later.
Cast [火焰之雨] to start an early [敬魔仪式] cycle. You can also pre-cycle through [敬魔仪式: Overlord] and [敬魔仪式: Mother of Chaos] to have [敬魔仪式: Pit Lord] up for the first pack of enemies that you engage.
Help out your healer by dispelling [疑之影] with your Imp's [烧灼驱魔].
Use your defensives during [喧神教化].
[爆燃冲刺] helps you dodge [惊魂恫吓].
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
You can either dispel [寒冰镰刀] with [烧灼驱魔] or cleanse it with [灵魂燃烧：恶魔法阵].
Use your defensives for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy.
You can use [治疗石] or [死亡缠绕] to get rid of [腐化附层].
Use [浩劫] on the boss to use Ravenous Scarabs as funnel damage through [暗影灼烧].
Use your defensives for [捻接] since it's the highest damage event during this fight.

[蛛网箭] from Sureki Silkbinder.

Cast [火焰之雨] to start an early [敬魔仪式] cycle. You can also pre-cycle through [敬魔仪式: Overlord] and [敬魔仪式: Mother of Chaos] to have [敬魔仪式: Pit Lord] up for the first pack of enemies that you engage.
[碎颅打击]
Deals 2 instances of physical damage over 2 seconds, while also applying a bleed to you.
[命令咆哮]
Summons [暗影烈焰吐息] so be sure to position the boss in the safe lane.

[锻造武器] - Summons one of the following 3 weapons:‍Molten FlurryPhysical damage cast while applying ‍Molten Spark to party members.‍Fiery CleaveThis frontal can be baited by anyone in the group. Bait this into a wall if possible.
[熔岩重锤]
Kite the boss during this duration, don't tank him.
While walking he leaves behind [熔岩池] so kite him at the edge of the room.
[暗影烈焰祈祷]
Invoked Shadowflame Spirit casts [烈焰凝视].
Grip it away with [锁链咒符].
[暗影烈焰箭]
This cast is always on you, interrupt when it is ready.
[暮光打击]‍Twilight Wind spawns after, drag away from them to make it easy for the group.
Position the boss in a new corner whenever [暮光打击] is coming up.
[噬体烈焰]
This frontal breath is always aimed at you, position it away from the group into a wall if possible.
[暗影飓风]
Position the boss in the middle of this circle and adjust when it starts shrinking.
[虚空涌动]
Summons Void Tendril
Cast [烈火烙印] if you want to clear Void Tendril's otherwise get a dps/healer to use an immunity to clear them.
[虚空灌输]
Summons Twilight Hatchling
When killed they explode with [暗影之伤].
[碾碎]
Physical and magical damage hit. This knocks you back so watch out for Void Tendrils.
Cast [地狱火撞击] to cancel the knockback and position yourself accordingly.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Twilight Earthcaller - [剧烈震颤]
Twilight Beguiler - [思维链]
Pay extra attention to these casts:
Twilight Destroyer - [晦暗之风]
You can LoS this cast.
Twilight Overseer - [鲁莽战术]
Purge it if needed.
Molten Giant - [熔岩觉醒]
Always stack up to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together to ensure you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Use [黑暗契约] whenever it's ready for this ability.
Use [不灭决心] for [大地破裂].
Utilize your Imp's [烧灼驱魔] to dispel [震地回响] off of your tank.
Dispel it right before [震地猛击] to give your tank the 50% damage reduction from [石盾].
Cast [浩劫] on the boss before you start killing the Crystal Shards.
[暗影灼烧] is a great spell to control the [结晶喷发] stacks.
Use your defensive before [结晶喷发] happens or while you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
You want to avoid [结晶喷发] happening back to back at all costs because the damage most likely kills a group member.
Make sure to use your Felhunter for this fight, set it to passive, and use pet attack on Speaker Brokk to quickly interrupt [熔铁之水] with [法术封锁] whenever he jumps away.
Use your defensive during [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Place your [烧烤之道] in the middle of the room to quickly teleport back after dropping [熵灭] from [熵能清算].
Use your defensive on [熵能清算].

Do not try to [恶魔法阵：传送] over a [黑曜光束]. It still applies the dot to you which deals a ton of damage.

You can utilize your Imp's [烧灼驱魔] to dispel [燃烧之影].

Set up a [恶魔传送门] for players to use right before they get hit by the [黑暗放逐] projectile.
Do note that you still die after 50 seconds after doing this. It's a gain if the boss has low health or you have multiple combat resurrections to spare.
Don't do it if you have 0 combat resurrections ready!

[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.

Help soak the [冰冻之血] from the tank.
Use your at least [法术反射] for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy, first is 1 minute into the fight and then 1 minute and 18 seconds apart.

Use your [[[[法术反射]]]] for [[[捻接]]].  The cooldown of  法术反射 is just barely too long to cleanly get it for all, but you can get most of  捻接 covered if you instantly use 法术反射 as soon as 捻接 is applied or cooldown of 法术反射 is up.
Save AoE cooldowns for [晦幽纺纱], you can get some difficult overlaps with [变易异常] relocating. You can remove the root with [天神下凡].

Alternate [法术反射], [剑在人在] and [防御姿态] for [大地破裂] or [折光射线] when you are breaking many [不稳定尖刺].

Control your damage on Crystal Shards so that you don't get several stacks of [[结晶喷发]], but still kill them quickly. Aim to always have 1 stack of 结晶喷发 ticking on you, since if you take too long time [加固壳壁] consumes the Crystal Shards and still damage you but also increase the potency of Sharmoraks absorb shield.
Use your defensives when you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
Make sure to interrupt [熔铁之水] from Speaker Brokk.
Use your defensives for [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Balance your damage to defeat Speaker Brokk and Speaker Dorlita at the same time, whoever survives after the other is defeated starts doing a lot of damage with [沉默代言人].
Save [[剑在人在]] for in case something goes bad with [虚空腐蚀] and you have to hold the debuff for a while, or use 剑在人在 if you are low health with [熵能清算] going out.

If any adds are still alive during [最终收割], use [风暴之锤] or [震荡波] to crowd-control them. With them crowd-controlled, the boss doesn't cast [折磨回响] even though an add is alive.

Use a defensive if targeted by [缝针] when low health.

[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.

You can use defensives in a priority system here for [激流破奔]:‍Spell Reflection if ready.‍Die by the Sword if ready.‍Defensive Stance if needed.

Attack Demolishing Terror as a priority over Gripping Terror.

[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.

Use [法术反射] when Valiona casts [暮光打击].
You can use [[[法术反射]]] to reflect [深渊之攫] from Void Tendril, and it also does not consume 法术反射 so you can clear several Void Tendrils with 1 法术反射.
Be careful of the timing when you kill Mutated Hatchlings, you don't want to overlap [暗影之伤] debuff with [深渊腐蚀] or [虚空涌动].
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[大地之箭] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[剧烈震颤] from Twilight Earthcaller.
[暗影烈焰箭] from Twilight Beguiler.
[思维链] from Twilight Beguiler.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Both of Avanoxx abilities [警示尖鸣] and [蛛纱强袭] have 40 seconds cooldown.
[警示尖鸣] is physical damage, go in [防御姿态] or use [狂怒回复] if needed.
Use [法术反射] to reduce damage taken from [蛛纱强袭].
Use at least [法术反射] when affected by [感染], and remember you place a [无休虫群] pool when it expires.
Kill Bloodstained Webmages fast and interrupt [流丝束缚].
[培植毒药] come just slightly too frequently to use [[法术反射]] for all of them. When you can't use 法术反射 use [狂怒回复] instead, like shown in the timeline below.
When you're affected by [抓握之血] you can use any form of crowd control such as [震荡波] instead of killing it to cancel your root.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[共振弹幕] from Trilling Attendant.
[惊惧尖鸣] from Ixin.
[恶臭齐射] from Bloodstained Webmage.
[毒液箭雨] from Blood Overseer.
Pay extra attention to these casts:
[预警尖鸣] from Sentry Stagshell
A really long cast that needs to get disrupted.
[野蛮猛击] from Nerubian Hauler and Hulking Bloodguard
A short stun that ramps in damage done per cast.
Use your [法术反射] during [喧神教化], you have it ready for every cast.
[喧神教化] spawns a pool, so make sure to stand on and follow the tank as the cast finishes.
Watch out for [飞刀投掷]. Use defensives if you're targeted by this ability.
Help soak the [冰冻之血] from the tank.
Use your at least [法术反射] for [黑暗脉动]. This happens at 100 boss energy, first is 1 minute into the fight and then 1 minute and 18 seconds apart.

Use your [[[[法术反射]]]] for [[[捻接]]].  The cooldown of  法术反射 is just barely too long to cleanly get it for all, but you can get most of  捻接 covered if you instantly use 法术反射 as soon as 捻接 is applied or cooldown of 法术反射 is up.
Save AoE cooldowns for [晦幽纺纱], you can get some difficult overlaps with [变易异常] relocating.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[蛛网箭] from Sureki Silkbinder.
[阴织冲击] from Covert Webmancer.
[愈合之网] from Covert Webmancer.
[扭曲思绪] from Herald of Anurek.
[虚空之波] from Sureki Unnaturaler.
Try to spawn [不稳定尖刺] close together or in a line so you can detonate them all with 1 [折光射线].
Alternate [法术反射], [狂怒回复] and [防御姿态] for [大地破裂] or [折光射线] when you are breaking many [不稳定尖刺].

Control your damage on Crystal Shards so that you don't get several stacks of [[结晶喷发]], but still kill them quickly. Aim to always have 1 stack of 结晶喷发 ticking on you, since if you take too long time [加固壳壁] will consume the Crystal Shards and still damage you but also increase the potency of Sharmoraks absorb shield.
Use your defensives when you have multiple stacks of  [不稳定的能量].
Make sure to interrupt [熔铁之水] from Speaker Brokk.
Use your defensives for [排放口] and [炽焰波峰].
Balance your damage to defeat Speaker Brokk and Speaker Dorlita at the same time, whoever survives after the other is defeated start doing a lot of damage with [沉默代言人].
Save [[狂怒回复]] for in case something goes bad with [虚空腐蚀] and you have to hold the debuff for a while, or use 狂怒回复 if you are low health with [熵能清算] going out.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[咆哮恐惧] from Ghastly Voidsoul.
[噤声齿轮] from Turned Speaker.
[穿透哀嚎] from Void Bound Howler.
[愈合金属] from Forgebound Mender and Cursedforge Mender.
[弧形虚空] from Cursedheart Invader.
Use [法术反射] during [黑曜光束], it should be ready for all of them.
There is a bad overlap with the 4th [暗黑法球] exploding and the 3rd [晦影腐朽], save [狂怒回复] for this overlap.
Use [法术反射], and [防御姿态] if needed, for [晦影腐朽].
[暗黑法球] does more damage if it explodes closer to you, be ready to go into [防御姿态] if needed.
Use [英勇飞跃] to quickly deliver [阿拉希炸弹].
Use [法术反射] when Rasha'nan casts [侵蚀喷涌], the DoT it applies [萦绕侵蚀] does a lot of damage.
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[暗夜箭] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
[诱捕暗影] from Nightfall Shadowmage.
Interrupt [灵魂之箭] every time a non-tank player is targeted, unless it is on you then let it go through and use [法术反射].
Use [狂暴之怒] to immune [憎恨之容].
Try to line up your cooldowns with Droman Oulfarran's [宗主之怒] to gain a huge DPS boost. This happens when Droman Oulfarran reaches 20% health.
Use [风暴之锤] as backup crowd-control if needed to control the Illusionary Vulpins. It is better to get longer duration crowd-control from other classes.
Use your defensives during the [猜谜游戏].
Use [英勇飞跃] if needed to break [心灵连接] quickly.
Use [法术反射] and [狂怒回复] during [吞噬].

[灵魂之箭] from Drust Harvester.
[收割精魂] from Drust Harvester.

[木棘外壳] from Mistveil Shaper.
[再生鼓舞] from Spinemaw Staghorn.
[模拟抗性] from Spinemaw Staghorn.

Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
Use at least [法术反射] as a defensive if you're targeted by [深重呕吐].
Use [震荡波] on Carrion Worms.
If any adds are still alive during ‍[最终收割], try to time a ‍[震荡波] or [风暴之锤]. With them crowd-controlled the adds don’t explode and wipe the group despite being alive.
Aim [[肉钩]] towards Surgeon Stitchflesh, and pay attention to when Surgeon Stitchflesh [逃脱] to the platform to bring him back instantly with 肉钩.

Control your damage to Stitchflesh's Creation so that it stays alive for the [逃脱] into [肉钩] to bring back Surgeon Stitchflesh instantly, but that it does not live much longer than that. The main damage you take in this fight comes from [溃烂] with damage that is ramping up while Stitchflesh's Creation lives.
You can use [法术反射] to reflect [冻结之缚].
Important abilities to interrupt in this dungeon are:
[排干体液] from Corpse Harvester and Corpse Collector.
[通灵箭] from Zolramus Sorceror & Zolarmus Necromancer.
[刺耳尖啸] from Skeletal Marauder.
[寒冰箭雨] from Reanimted Mage.
[瘀液喷撒] from Corpse Collector.
[修复血肉] from Flesh Crafter.
You can deflect [吐疫] from Rotspew with [法术反射].
Line up your cooldowns with the boss walking over Bombs which afflict him with [重型军火].
The main damage you take in this fight is from [炽热弹头]. You can't reflect it, but use [法术反射] for the damage reduction when affected.
Focus down the Ashvane Cannoneer during the phase change to quickly use [易爆军火] to get the boss down from the ship.
Use [法术反射] when affected by [炽烈弹射].
Use [狂怒回复] and [防御姿态] if you get [一枪毙命].
If your group does not have a passive slow then keep up [断筋] to keep the boss from jumping because of [闪避].
The only unavoidable damage in this fight comes from [激流破奔]. This ability is cast around every 20-24 seconds, just barely too often to have [法术反射] for all.
You can use defensives in a priority system here for [激流破奔]:‍Spell Reflection if ready.‍Enraged Regeneration if ready.‍Defensive Stance if needed.
If you can't avoid a [深渊的呼唤] use [法术反射] to deflect.
Use [法术反射] or [狂怒回复] when afflicted by [腐败之水].
Attack Demolishing Terror as a priority over Gripping Terror.

[盐渍飞弹] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[防水甲壳] from Irontide Waveshaper.
[水箭] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[窒息之水] from Bilge Rat Tempest.
[强化怒吼] from Ashvane Commander.
Use [法术反射] when General Umbriss casts [命令咆哮].
You take a lot of damage from [炽热] when Forgmaster Throngus casts [[锻造武器]]. This happens around 20 seconds apart from each other, so you can use [法术反射] for every other 锻造武器.
Use [法术反射] when Valiona casts [暮光打击].
You can use [[[法术反射]]] to reflect [深渊之攫] from Void Tendril, and it also does not consume 法术反射 so you can clear several Void Tendrils with 1 法术反射.
Be careful of the timing when you kill Mutated Hatchlings, you don't want to overlap [暗影之伤] debuff with [深渊腐蚀] or [虚空涌动].
Use defensives during [深渊腐蚀] and [虚空涌动].
